Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino  Ultrasonic Censor Posted on July 6, 2023January 26, 2024 by admin In todays rapidly evolving digital landscape, the Internet of Things IoT has emerged as a transformative force, connecting various physical devices and enabling them to communicate and share data seamlessly. At Sunway College Kathmandu, we recognize the significance of IoT and its potential to revolutionize numerous industries. Our dedicated IoT team supports students in exploring and creating innovative projects, turning their ideas into reality. One remarkable creation by our talented IT and research team is the IoT-Based Obstacle-Avoiding Car. At Sunway College Kathmandu, we are committed to empowering our students with the knowledge and practical skills needed to excel in the realm of IoT. Lets have a good insight into IoT-Based Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car. Introduction In recent years, the advancement of technology has revolutionized the automotive industry, paving the way for intelligent and autonomous vehicles. One such development is the automatic obstacle-avoiding car, which utilizes various components like Arduino, Arduino Motor Shield, HC-05 Bluetooth module, Ultrasonic sensor, and voice detection using Android to create a sophisticated and efficient system. This research paper aims to explore the design, implementation, and functionality of such a car, highlighting its potential applications and benefits. Overview of the System Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino and Ultrasonic Sensor for Intelligent Navigation is a smart vehicle that can autonomously detect obstacles in its path and navigate accordingly. The system integrates multiple components to achieve its functionality: Arduino: Arduino is an open-source microcontroller platform that serves as the brain of the car. It provides an interface between the various modules and sensors, allowing them to communicate and work together efficiently. Arduino Motor Shield: The Arduino Motor Shield is an add-on board that enables the control of multiple motors simultaneously. It allows precise control over the cars movement, including speed, direction, and rotation. HC-05 Bluetooth Module: The HC-05 Bluetooth module facilitates wireless communication between the car and an Android device. It enables remote control of the vehicle, adding an element of convenience and versatility to the system. Ultrasonic Sensor: The ultrasonic sensor plays a crucial role in obstacle detection. By emitting ultrasonic waves and measuring the time taken for the waves to bounce back, the sensor can determine the distance between the car and any obstruction in its path. System Design and Implementation To implement the automatic obstacle-avoiding car, the following steps are involved: Hardware Setup Connect the Arduino board to the Arduino Motor Shield and mount it on the car chassis. Attach the ultrasonic sensor to the front of the car, ensuring it has a clear line of sight. Connect the HC-05 Bluetooth module to the Arduino board for wireless communication. Set up the Android device to establish a connection with the HC-05 module. 2. Software Development Write the Arduino code to control the motor movements based on the input received from the ultrasonic sensor. Develop an Android application that communicates with the car via Bluetooth. Implement voice recognition capabilities in the Android application using libraries or APIs. System Functionality Once the system is set up, it can perform the following functions: Obstacle Detection and Avoidance: The ultrasonic sensor continuously measures the distance to nearby objects. If an obstacle is detected within a certain range, the Arduino board instructs the motors to stop or change direction to avoid a collision. Bluetooth Control: Through the Android application, the user can control the car wirelessly. They can send commands to move the car forward, backward, left, or right. The Arduino board receives these commands via the HC-05 module and executes the corresponding motor movements. Applications and Benefits The automatic obstacle-avoiding car has various practical applications and benefits, including: Education and Research: This project serves as an excellent educational tool for students and hobbyists interested in robotics, automation, and embedded systems. It provides hands-on experience in assembling and programming a complex system, fostering a deeper understanding of engineering concepts. Additionally, researchers can utilize the car to explore advancements in autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance algorithms. Indoor Navigation and Surveillance: The automatic obstacle-avoiding car can be employed in indoor environments such as warehouses, hospitals, or museums for surveillance or navigation purposes. It can autonomously navigate through the premises, avoiding obstacles and collecting valuable data or performing monitoring tasks. Assistive Technology: The cars obstacle detection and avoidance capabilities make it suitable for assistive technology applications. For individuals with mobility impairments, it can act as a robotic aid, helping them navigate safely through their environment. By integrating voice commands, it offers an intuitive and accessible means of control. Entertainment and Gaming: The cars wireless control and voice recognition features make it an engaging platform for entertainment and gaming applications. Users can enjoy controlling the car remotely using their Android device, competing in obstacle courses, or participating in interactive games that require precise movements and quick responses. Prototyping and Development: The automatic obstacle-avoiding car serves as a prototyping platform for testing and developing algorithms and functionalities for autonomous vehicles. It provides a cost-effective and customizable solution for evaluating navigation strategies, sensor fusion techniques, and human-machine interaction interfaces. Conclusion Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino and Ultrasonic Sensor for Intelligent Navigation using Arduino, Arduino Motor Shield, HC-05, Ultrasonic Sensor, and voice detection using Android presents an innovative and practical solution for autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance. Combining these components offers a versatile and interactive platform for education, research, indoor navigation, assistive technology, entertainment, and prototyping. The integration of Bluetooth control and voice recognition further enhances the user experience, making the car more accessible and convenient to operate. With continued advancements in technology, this project opens up new possibilities for intelligent and autonomous vehicles in various domains. This remarkable project showcases the potential of IoT technology in creating intelligent and autonomous systems. Through our dedicated IoT team, we provide our students with the necessary support and resources to explore their ideas and turn them into tangible realities. Join us at Sunway College Kathmandu to unlock your potential in the exciting world of IoT. Apply Now! Dont worry Sunway College Kathmandu has been providing a pre-foundation course consisting of four days where you will be introduced to the fascinating world of AI Data Science. Therefore, participating in this pre-foundation course will help to equip you with the necessary skills and information to help you determine your career path.In this 4 day Pre-foundation Course, you will be able to learn about career scope in IT, Introduction to Machine Learning ML and Artificial Intelligence AI, the role of Mathematics in ML, Data Analytics Tools and Visualization, Personal Branding, Video Editing, Graphic Design and so on. Benefits of choosing our Pre-foundation Course Get a chance to build a Network with AI enthusiasts Get to know about the basic concept of AI  Data Science Get an opportunity to develop basic IT skills Get a participation certificate in Machine Learning, Data Science, and AI Why IT as a Career? Discover the world of IT careers on our first day of boot camp. This friendly and informative session will give you insights into different fields and scopes within IT. Uncover the incredible scope and various fields within IT, helping you make an informed decision about your future path. Perfect for beginners like you! What are Machine Learning, the Importance of Mathematics in ML, and the scope of data science? Day 2 of our boot camp is all about ML! Discover the basics of ML and its connection to math topics like matrices and statistics from your 2 or 10th grade. Moreover, uncover the fundamental role of mathematics in ML and explore why ML is essential and how it predicts the future. Regarding skills, proficiency in mathematics and programming is essential for performing job tasks. Mathematics serves as the foundation of Data Science and Machine Learning, while programming can be learned as needed. What are Data Analytical Tools and Data Visualization? Day 3 of our foundation course focuses on explaining the significance of data visualization. It explores why charts are preferred over text and provides an opportunity for students to gain hands-on experience with Python code for visualization. Why Personal Development, Video Editing, and Graphic Design? We believe that all students who have completed their 2 examinations should learn how to establish their brand. This skill is highly valued in both daily life and the corporate world. Additionally, building a strong profile requires proficiency in video editing and graphic design. These skills are essential for effectively presenting oneself in any setting. If you want to build your career in the IT sector then Enroll now and secure your spot in Pre-foundation Course. Conclusion Dont miss out on this exceptional opportunity to kickstart your journey in IT! Our Pre-Foundation Course provides the essential knowledge, bridging the gap between 2 education and the world of IT and AI. As a testament to their dedication, we provide digital certificates to all participants upon completion. Besides the free pre-foundation course, we provide a four-year degree in BScHons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence in Academic Partnership with Birmingham City University, UK. Students can also apply for up to 100 scholarships based on their IELTS Score. prompt: Summarize this general content: February 2023 - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Month: February 2023 IELTS scholarships for 2 graduates: an amazing offer by Sunway Posted on February 24, 2023June 9, 2023 by admin The headline seems too good to be true, isnt it? No, its not clickbait. It is indeed true that you have this opportunity for up to 100 IELTS scholarships to study BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence based on your IELTS score. If you have successfully completed your 12th grade exam along with the IELTS International English Language Proficiency Test, then you are a prospective student to receive up to 100 IELTS scholarship based on your score. So, without wasting any seconds, apply now and grab this opportunity. The score part is described in detail below, so keep reading. Also, I will be referring to the IELTS score-based scholarships simply as IELTS scholarships. So, dont get confused; it is an IELTS score-based scholarship. If your to-be career profile says, I want to: study in my home country. study in my home country with a foreign degree. study a bachelors degree in computer science and artificial intelligence. study a bachelors degree in computer science and artificial intelligence with a professional paid placement. study computer science and artificial intelligence in Nepal with foreign degree and a 9-month paid placement. Have IELTS scholarships .. ahem what? Congratulations! We are a match. But how does it match? IELTS scholarships and Artificial Intelligence. Am I missing something here? Please allow me to put your misunderstanding to rest. First, you must understand the relationship between our computer science and artificial intelligence course and the English Proficiency Test. Our purpose The purpose of giving the IELTS scholarships is to assist and motivate individuals who have shown they are proficient in the English language and who wish to pursue further education. By taking this action, the college wants to encourage you to finish your degrees domestically rather than abroad. The scholarship amount will be based on the students IELTS scores, as follows: IELTS scoresIELTS scholarships on college semester fees6, with each band score of 5.530 scholarship6.5, with each band score of 640 scholarship 7, with each band score of 6.550 scholarship7.5, with each band score of 760 scholarship8, with each band score of 7.570 scholarship8.5, with each band score of 880 scholarship9, with each band score of 8.5100 scholarshipIELTS scholarships on the basis of IELTS score I am guessing you are wondering about the fee structure too. Whats more, you must have taken and passed the IELTS test within the last two years, so you must present documentation of your results in order to be eligible for the scholarship. The scholarship will be awarded to a small number of students and will be based on both academic excellence and financial need. Why English proficiency test? Because this is a UK degree and the criteria are established by Birmingham City University BCU. I want to be clear about why you should care about having strong academic English before I continue. Im assuming youve already completed an English proficiency test, so you already have a basic understanding of its significance. Firstly, Academic English is the language used in academic contexts including colleges, research facilities, and business conventions. It is a formal and specialized form of communication that is important for the academic and professional settings. Secondly, The importance of Academic English  Academic success depends on effective communication, and Academic English allows you as an academics to explain your ideas and discoveries in a precise and straightforward manner.  The preferred language in academic and professional situations is Academic English. It is a formal method of communication that exudes that you are competent and serious about your job.  A key component of career advancement in many academic domains is the publication of researches. You as a researcher must be able to convey your findings in academic English because this is the language used in the majority of academic journals and publications.  English is the most widely utilized language for academic communication on a global scale. You can interact productively with colleagues from other nations and cultures by utilizing academic English. In summary, academic English is essential for success in academic and professional settings. It allows you to communicate clearly and precisely, convey professionalism, publish your research, and communicate globally with colleagues from different countries and cultures. IELTS scholarships: A blessing in disguise Furthermore, this offer could be a blessing in disguise for those of you who have gone through visa rejection and are in a dilemma of whats next for me? This is clearly your chance to shine again by studying computer science and artificial intelligence at a 501-600 world-ranking university in Kathmandu, with this incredible scholarship. You must demonstrate your English proficiency with the BCU recognized English tests: IELTS TOEFL PTE; 6.0 Score with each band of 5.5. So, there you go. If you have passed your IELTSTOEFLPTE exam then you dont need to give any proficiency test to enroll in artificial intelligence. And the icing on the cake for IELTS-passed students is that now you have the added benefit of grabbing scholarships to study in your home country as well. In addition, let me give you a little brief on what it is so that you can also savor the benefit of the IELTS score based scholarships. What is IELTS? The International English Language Testing System IELTS is one of the most popular English proficiency testing systems if you are applying to a country whose native language is English. IELTS and similar proficiency systems are essential if you are going abroad to work, study, or migrate. The purpose of IELTS classes is all about assessing your ability to listen, read, write, and speak English. Also, you will be graded on a scale of 1-9. How long is IELTS class in Nepal? Depending on the institute and their rules, it can differ, but the ideal duration is 67 weeks. Some have accelerated classes too, which are completed faster. IELTS classes are typically 1 to 2 hours long every day of the week along with a mock test once a week. What is the cost of an IELTS course in Nepal? Again, this depends on the kind of institutes you are thinking of enrolling in. The price can go as high as Rs. 10,000 and some even provide on Rs.6000 including books and materials that you will need during your learning. Also, it is up to you to choose the best institution for you. Most significantly, the teacher needs to be extremely competent and able to instruct even the weakest pupil. To wrap things up on the IELTS scholarships, Being a high school graduate is one of the most difficult things in the world. Now, everyones prying eyes are on you. Your career, your goals, your subject, and your passion are all in question. Youre probably wondering, Home country or foreign country? We say, Why not both? Not everyone can ever be sure what they want to do in the future. So, if you appear to be interested in computer science and artificial intelligence, we are confident in our IELTS scholarships for you. Finally, this is a once-in-a lifetime opportunity, and scholarships are something almost all of us need. Therefore, apply for the IELTS scholarships and seize the day! prompt: Summarize this general content: Social Media Marketing: Why is it Important? - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Social Media Marketing: Why is it Important? Posted on December 19, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin Today, businesses of all sizes and industries require a powerful social media presence. The platform provides easy access to targeted audiences, making it the most effective digital marketing tool. This form of marketing creates awareness, recognition, and interaction between customers and brands. Why is Social Media Marketing Important in 2023? There are many reasons to use social networking sites but most of these are directly or indirectly related to promotion and branding. Social media marketing is part of a corporate marketing plan that contributes more to your marketing and sales than any other marketing medium. It is a platform to engage with your friends and family. Based on similar reasons that individuals use their social handles, here are some reasons to use them for your marketing campaign: Tell your brands story Connect with your audience Analyze customers and competitors Promote your brand, product, and services with ads Social Media Marketing For Storytelling About Your Brand Social media is a platform where your presence can help you build your brand. Your online interaction with your customers allows you to tell your brand story and build trust. Regular content postings on such platforms give your brand more exposure and slowly introduce it to a broader audience. Building A Connection With Your Audience Regular engagement builds a strong connection between you and your customers. It helps them prioritize your product and service over other brands as they are more attached to you and are aware of your product and policies. Connection with your audience helps you grow your business, improve product quality, and gain valuable feedback. Social Media Marketing for Analyzing Customers and Competitors You can learn your customers purchase behaviors, including the topics that interest them. It will help you improve your product and marketing strategies. Promoting Your Brand, Product, and Services with Ads All popular social platforms have paid marketing features. You can use your existing audience on the platform to target them with personalized ads or target similar audiences. Content Marketing As Part Of Social Media Marketing Marketers use content marketing as a part of their marketing strategy to improve the brand customers trust and credibility. It involves using a variety of engaging content formats, such as blogs, articles, videos, infographics, posts, and more which engages and aware the audience regarding the brands products and services. Final Words In a nutshell, Social Media Marketing is crucial for leveraging the business platform and inducing growth. Social Media Marketing can be done by setting up an in-house team or by hiring an external marketing agency; however, big corporations have both in-house teams as well as work with external marketing agencies. Some of the prominent Marketing Agencies in Nepal you can work with in Nepal are : 1. Infinity Digital Agency 2. Elance Digital Media 3. Ideajar 4. Wizonbiz Digital and Many more To set up an in-house team, it is important to recruit marketers that are technically and academically qualified. In the world of Social Media, it is crucial to hire someone in the Social Media Marketing team who has a good grasp of marketing concepts along with a remarkable knowledge of how marketing works in the digital sphere. In Nepal, there is a strong need for technically and academically sound marketers; however, there is also a lack of academic courses dedicated to Digital Marketing. prompt: Summarize this general content: All About BScHons Computer and Data Science  Sunway College
completion: All you need to know about BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Scope  Placements  Career Posted on November 6, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Overview Sunway College Kathmandu in academic partnership with Birmingham City University BCU, offers BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Let us have complete information about our computer science and artificial intelligence course, its syllabus, scope, career, salary, and placement. What is BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems. Artificial Intelligence is a complicated field of study, but you can become an expert in one of its subfields with the right amount of learning, guidance, and training. Why BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? The BscHons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence degree provides you with a broad understanding of Machine Learning, AI, and Neural Networks. The program also prepares you with concepts like computer programming, database, data analysis, visualization, data structure and algorithms, and cyber security. This makes you a skilled and competitive candidate for a data science job. This course gives you hands-on experience in the artificial intelligence and data science field before you graduate. To ensure you get real experience of the workspace we have incorporated industry internship in our program. We work closely with industrial partners to safeguard your internship program. The right time to pursue an Artificial Intelligence career The recent advances in digitization have made Artificial Intelligence a very promising field. Why? Because we have access to the right resources and tools for extracting information from the data using various AI algorithms. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence  Eligibility Criteria and Entrance Exams To be an AI expert requires a great logical understanding and AIML concepts. You need to learn computer programming and understand machine learning, and some major artificial intelligence tools and techniques. Our eligibility criteria to join a data science course is pretty straightforward. Youll need at least a GPA of 3.0 in your 2 or equivalent degree to qualify for this course. We will take a brief entrance exam that helps us understand your interest and your understanding of computer programming and data science. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Syllabus and Subject Our BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence program provides you with a complete understanding of every Artificial Intelligence concept. A solid academic foundation in Machine learning and AI tools is combined with in-depth digital expertise in real-world projects? And an incorporated internship in our program with our MoU partners so you can adapt and experience working in the full-fledged AI expert team. Our 9 months of professional placement will for sure help you become industry ready before you graduate. Still not sure if you will make it into the Artificial Intelligence Program? Well, we can help you decide for yourself. How do I know I am made for BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? You may find yourself confused by a range of possible career options, but we have compiled a list of tips that can help you identify if youre suited to the field of artificial Intelligence. You love Mathematics and Analytics A better mathematician is better at creating and optimizing logic. You definitely also like to analyze insights, work with probabilities, and perform other similar logical tasks. You already know how to code or youre learning If you already understand object-oriented programming and database concepts, or learn them. You are already preparing for a good data career ahead. You think easy solutions to complicated problems A better data scientist is one who can solve complicated problems with algorithms and data science. If you can think of a solution to tough problems, data science is for you. You are thrilled with AI and Machine Learning Most importantly, if you want to talk about AI and machine learning every time and everywhere, you are made for data science. Skill Sets Required for Pursuing Artificial Intelligence Career Interested in pursuing a career in artificial intelligence? Weve compiled a list of the skills that matter most. Programming Skill Programmingcoding is a primary skill to work in data science. You are required to learn one of the programming languages such as Python or R to get valued at a data science job interview. Data Warehousing and ETL tools. As a data engineer, youll deal with a massive amount of data. Youll need to use a data warehousing service to store and analyze such data. ETL Extract Transform Load tools help you to extract data from multiple sources to store it in your data warehouse. So, Data Warehouse and ETL tools are important to learn. Database Systems This again comes to data. You must understand multiple database systems. Youll need to run different database queries to extract or filter out data from a big pool of collected data. Understanding SQL and NoSQL-based databases is a must to work in a data science field. Data Analytics You must know how to analyze data to extract information from it. As a data scientist, you must know how to use industry data analytics tools. Understanding of Machine Learning As a data scientist, you use machine learning to build data models and analyze the data statistically. Even if you work as a data engineer, a brief understanding of how machine learning works can help you work efficiently with the team. Critical thinking for a Solution Data science is followed to get a solution to the problem through analyzing the data. You should develop a habit of thinking of a solution. You should know how to choose different dimensions of data points that can solve the problem most efficiently. Multiple Operating System As a data engineer, youll work with multiple sources of data, software, IoT devices, and cloud servers. Therefore, its good to have experience using operating systems like Linux, Windows, and Mac OS. Data Engineering Educational Backgrounds A data engineering academic background is preferred but not a compulsion to work in a data science field. You can also work on various open-source personal projects to prove your skills if you dont want to follow the academic route to work in the data science field. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence: Scope and Top Recruiters Similar to a digital marketing career, there is an immense scope of data science and artificial intelligence. There is the freedom to work in any industry, anytime and anywhere as a data scientist. Every commercial company requires decision-making. Every large corporation, nonprofit, bank, eCommerce, shopping mall, school, or college regularly conducts meetings and planning. The companys growth is very dependent on the decisions. You as a data scientist help suggest a decision based on facts. Youll approach a solution supported by data and machine learning outcomes, that will give the optimum result. As a data scientist, you can work in any data company, or in a data team in any company. At present, while writing this blog, there are over 100 open vacancies for the data team. And trust us again, every great tech company is looking to hire a quality data expert. Data Science: Job Profiles and Salary The salary of a Data Scientist varies from location to location and experience wise. However, there is no limit if one has the potential to deliver. Data Scientists in Nepal are likely to observe a salary increase of approximately 8 every 29 months. Top Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Recruiters in Nepal Artificial Intelligence and Data Science is an emerging IT sector in Nepal, as it is one of the priorities for every innovative tech company. Some of the tech companies as well as corporate houses that recruit data science professionals are : Cotiviti Nepal LIS Nepal Pvt. Ltd OmnicomMediaGroup Nepal Brainnest Verisk Nepal Pvt. Ltd Fusemachines GrowByData Moonlit Solutions Alphateds Kharpann Keiv Technology Extenso Data Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Scope Abroad AI  Data science are one of the highest-paid fields in abroad countries. A good data scientist can earn over 300k yearly, which is considered a top income in a corporate job. The demand is rising and similar companies are expanding worldwide to create a big scope and crisis for data scientists. For the interested ones, there is no reason not to pursue a data science career. Final Words This course is designed to equip students with the ability to understand and apply data science in the real field to bring the required marketing objective. As a result, this dynamic course helps you learn all the skills that are essential in an artificial intelligence and data science career, as a data scientist, data engineer, AI engineer, ML engineer and similar. prompt: Summarize this general content: How to become a Data Scientist? A beginners Guide
completion: How to become a data scientist? A beginners step-by-step guide to entering into the data science field. Posted on August 14, 2022January 26, 2024 by admin Data Science is an evolving field of this decade, and its a good idea to jump into it. The role of a data scientist is impactful, and you can change the world with it. According to Glass Door, the average salary of a data scientist 2021 is 121,120 in the United States. The high pay and increasing demand for data scientists signify there is a very secure career in this field. Lets dive into the main topic. How to become a data scientist after the 12th? Being a data scientist is a high-profile job that requires you to be skillful. It requires a lot of patience, hard work, and dedication to become a good data scientist. Lets break the steps down. A Degree in Data Science Field A skilled individual doesnt lag not having a bachelors degree. Although you will require academic credentials to gain initial trust, it is a rare and an undefined path to work as a data scientist with only your skills. A data science degree can help you get an initial weight with guidance from industry experts, and learn in and out of data science tools. Master relevant skills As a data scientist, youll work with data. It is a good idea to sharpen your skills related to the field. You must be good at a few programming languages that are used frequently in the data science field. Learn about Databases, database systems, data warehousing, ETL tools, data analytics, and a grasp of machine learning concepts. We have a detailed blog on this topic. Get an entry-level data analytics job A data scientist is a critical job role of a doctor. You should not expect to work as a data scientist directly. Its advisable to join a rising data science field as an intern. Slowly, youll gain trust with the company, and with guidance from experts and experience, you can be promoted to your dream job, and grow. Prepare for data science interviews Competition is natural in the field of data science. Prepare yourself for core questions in this field. Work on your communication skills, and learn to confidently answer the question. Revise your academic syllabus, take crash courses, and get ready to accept early rejections. A message from Sunway College Considering the rising demand in the data science field in Nepal. We have introduced a BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Our specialized course with an academic partnership with Birmingham City University BCU, will cover topics on Computer programming, data structures, cyber security, artificial intelligence, neural networks, and all topics that will be helpful in your career as a data scientist. Moreover, our team of field experts will guide you with their industry experience. Feel free to learn more here. prompt: Summarize this general content: data science Archives - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Category: data science What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle  Applications Posted on August 14, 2022January 26, 2024 by admin What is Data Science? Data science is a field where the use of data assists us in making predictions and concluding decisions. Likewise, with the means of raw data analysis and usage of combined procedures of statistical analysis, data analysis, and machine learning algorithms, diverse insights are generated to use as knowledge. How does Data Science work? It all starts with data, which helps in making easier strategic decisions. Data Science Working Lifecycle Data Collection: In this process, a data team identifies the type of data that helps to get the desired results. After identifying multiple data from various sources, they are structured into a common database to analyze and simplify it. Data Cleaning: Raw collection of data is incomplete and has multiple points of failure. Therefore, the data team fills up the missing data in a strategic way. Thats why they remove Multi outliers of data that distort the result. Data team efforts to make the data consistent and perfect aid the further analysis step. Data Analyzing In this step, the data team visualizes the data to identify different underlying patterns and data gems. Moreover, multiple creative approaches to the data analysis process creation help to obtain a better solution. Data Modelling This process starts after the data team applies the core of data, its science, and machine learning to find the initial essential features from the sample data. Likewise, after that, the data team uses data modeling to get the best data prediction. Data Storytelling Finally, after the data model is ready, the data team utilizes the results to straddle the data insights to make better strategic decisions for the company.Moreover, the insights are usually presented in user-friendly language and visualized so that the decision-taker can reference them and use them to accelerate the companys growth. History of Data Science Danish Computer Scientist Peter Naur introduced the term in 1974. Before the term was named, John Tukey, a mathematician, and statistician mentioned data analysis used statistics and computers to get a measurable solution to a problem that would take longer than manual calculations. Similarly, In 1977, the International Association for Statistical Computing was established with a mission to link traditional statistical methodology with modern computer technology to generate outcomes that are converted into knowledge to help make a decision. In 1989, the creators established the first workshop for Knowledge Discovery in Databases, later known as the ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining. In 1999, the CAO of DMWAY analytics, Jacob Zahavi noticed and realized the need to store as well as handle large-scale data. Moreover, Software-as-a-Service SaaS was created in 2000 to enable the new world of cloud-based applications. Some major marks in data science history were in: The year 2002: The International Council for Science: Committee on Data for Science and Technology began publishing the Data Science Journal. The year 2006: Hadoop, an open-source, non-relational database, was released The year 2009: NoSQL was reintroduced. The Year 2011: Job Listings for Data scientists increased by 150 times, and data science was the buzzword. The Year 2015: Using Machine Learning, Googles speech recognition had a significant improvement. Data Science Applications In the modern digital world, there are enormous applications of the field. We have mentioned a few of the important ones below: Health Care: Data science plays a leading role in healthcare advancements. Likewise, different tools and machine learning solutions have helped medical operators detect several diseases before its critical. Moreover, it has helped save the lives of thousands of individuals through early diagnosis of different heart and lung diseases. Digital Advertising Digital advertising is upgrading to a whole new standard with the help of data along with machine learning. Similarly, the machine learning algorithm models target the audience interested in the advertised products or services. Almost every social media and search engine utilizes data to target their advertisements. Fraud detection Data science has helped hundreds of online businesses together with individuals by rejecting suspicious transaction attempts through fraud detection. Likewise, multiple email services use fraud detection algorithms to analyze spam emails which helps to minimize fraud. Recommendation Systems Social media, e-commerce, OTT, and Music Streaming software use data-generating tools with machine learning to recommend the most likely results that fulfill the users intent. Reportedly, with the help of the recommender system, amazon sales have increased by over 29.Moreover, machine learning together with Data Science can upgrade almost any digital system. Likewise, other applications of recommender systems are image detection, autopilot in cars, smartwatch health systems, etc. Conclusion Wrapping it up. Data science is being utilized by almost every large company to its advantage. Therefore, this field of education has great potential and a bright career path to choose if you are interested. Do read our other blogs to understand more about data science. Posted in data scienceLeave a Comment on What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle  Applications How to become a data scientist? A beginners step-by-step guide to entering into the data science field. 6 Data Science Terms Everybody Must Know in 2023 Posted on August 11, 2022January 26, 2024 by admin What happens to all this data? Where does it go? What do we use it for? And, What do most popular data science terms resemble? Data science is the answer to all these questions. Data science is the field of science that applies algorithms, methods, and processes to extract information from random and non-random data. Simply put, it is the process of finding patterns among the noise and using it to predict and solve various problems across a wide range of applications. completion: Category: data science What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle  Applications Posted on August 14, 2022January 26, 2024 by admin What is Data Science? Data science is a field where the use of data assists us in making predictions and concluding decisions. Likewise, with the means of raw data analysis and usage of combined procedures of statistical analysis, data analysis, and machine learning algorithms, diverse insights are generated to use as knowledge. How does Data Science work? It all starts with data, which helps in making easier strategic decisions. Data Science Working Lifecycle Data Collection: In this process, a data team identifies the type of data that helps to get the desired results. After identifying multiple data from various sources, they are structured into a common database to analyze and simplify it. Data Cleaning: Raw collection of data is incomplete and has multiple points of failure. Therefore, the data team fills up the missing data in a strategic way. Thats why they remove Multi outliers of data that distort the result. Data team efforts to make the data consistent and perfect aid the further analysis step. Data Analyzing In this step, the data team visualizes the data to identify different underlying patterns and data gems. Moreover, multiple creative approaches to the data analysis process creation help to obtain a better solution. Data Modelling This process starts after the data team applies the core of data, its science, and machine learning to find the initial essential features from the sample data. Likewise, after that, the data team uses data modeling to get the best data prediction. Data Storytelling Finally, after the data model is ready, the data team utilizes the results to straddle the data insights to make better strategic decisions for the company.Moreover, the insights are usually presented in user-friendly language and visualized so that the decision-taker can reference them and use them to accelerate the companys growth. History of Data Science Danish Computer Scientist Peter Naur introduced the term in 1974. Before the term was named, John Tukey, a mathematician, and statistician mentioned data analysis used statistics and computers to get a measurable solution to a problem that would take longer than manual calculations. Similarly, In 1977, the International Association for Statistical Computing was established with a mission to link traditional statistical methodology with modern computer technology to generate outcomes that are converted into knowledge to help make a decision. In 1989, the creators established the first workshop for Knowledge Discovery in Databases, later known as the ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining. In 1999, the CAO of DMWAY analytics, Jacob Zahavi noticed and realized the need to store as well as handle large-scale data. Moreover, Software-as-a-Service SaaS was created in 2000 to enable the new world of cloud-based applications. Some major marks in data science history were in: The year 2002: The International Council for Science: Committee on Data for Science and Technology began publishing the Data Science Journal. The year 2006: Hadoop, an open-source, non-relational database, was released The year 2009: NoSQL was reintroduced. The Year 2011: Job Listings for Data scientists increased by 150 times, and data science was the buzzword. The Year 2015: Using Machine Learning, Googles speech recognition had a significant improvement. Data Science Applications In the modern digital world, there are enormous applications of the field. We have mentioned a few of the important ones below: Health Care: Data science plays a leading role in healthcare advancements. Likewise, different tools and machine learning solutions have helped medical operators detect several diseases before its critical. Moreover, it has helped save the lives of thousands of individuals through early diagnosis of different heart and lung diseases. Digital Advertising Digital advertising is upgrading to a whole new standard with the help of data along with machine learning. Similarly, the machine learning algorithm models target the audience interested in the advertised products or services. Almost every social media and search engine utilizes data to target their advertisements. Fraud detection Data science has helped hundreds of online businesses together with individuals by rejecting suspicious transaction attempts through fraud detection. Likewise, multiple email services use fraud detection algorithms to analyze spam emails which helps to minimize fraud. Recommendation Systems Social media, e-commerce, OTT, and Music Streaming software use data-generating tools with machine learning to recommend the most likely results that fulfill the users intent. Reportedly, with the help of the recommender system, amazon sales have increased by over 29.Moreover, machine learning together with Data Science can upgrade almost any digital system. Likewise, other applications of recommender systems are image detection, autopilot in cars, smartwatch health systems, etc. Conclusion Wrapping it up. Data science is being utilized by almost every large company to its advantage. Therefore, this field of education has great potential and a bright career path to choose if you are interested. Do read our other blogs to understand more about data science. Posted in data scienceLeave a Comment on What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle  Applications How to become a data scientist? As a data scientist, you will be the decision-maker of the organization where you will be handling immense amounts of data. Statistics and Probability Start by knowing the basics of Statistics and Probability. These are the major mathematical concepts of Data Science. You should be able to understand descriptive statistics where the topics include mean, median, and mode, linear regression, and hypothesis testing. Probability is also a very important part of data science as it is a precondition for mastering machine learning. Programming Language There isnt any specific programming language for Data Science. However, Python and R are popular programming languages in this field. Moreover, Python is the most preferred language by professionals due to the libraries and modules it provides. Along with that, most data teams also prefer Java, Scala, and C according to their needs. Machine Learning and Deep Learning Machine Learning and Deep Learning are two separate topics and the subsets of Data Science. Learning the basics of these domains will help you understand Data Science conveniently. Machine Learning and Deep Learning help in high-value predictions. It helps in analyzing a large amount of data, making the tasks of data scientists easier with an automated process and without any human intervention. Data Visualization Data scientists love Data Visualization. Representing data in the form of charts and graphs which helps other people to understand the data and make it more profitable. It helps in discovering the trends in data and is interactive. prompt: Summarize this general content: What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle, Applications  Sunway
completion: What is Data Science? History, Lifecycle  Applications Posted on August 14, 2022January 26, 2024 by admin What is Data Science? Data science is a field where the use of data assists us in making predictions and concluding decisions. Likewise, with the means of raw data analysis and usage of combined procedures of statistical analysis, data analysis, and machine learning algorithms, diverse insights are generated to use as knowledge. How does Data Science work? It all starts with data, which helps in making easier strategic decisions. Data Science Working Lifecycle Data Collection: In this process, a data team identifies the type of data that helps to get the desired results. After identifying multiple data from various sources, they are structured into a common database to analyze and simplify it. Data Cleaning: Raw collection of data is incomplete and has multiple points of failure. Therefore, the data team fills up the missing data in a strategic way. Thats why they remove Multi outliers of data that distort the result. Data team efforts to make the data consistent and perfect aid the further analysis step. Data Analyzing In this step, the data team visualizes the data to identify different underlying patterns and data gems. Moreover, multiple creative approaches to the data analysis process creation help to obtain a better solution. Data Modelling This process starts after the data team applies the core of data, its science, and machine learning to find the initial essential features from the sample data. Likewise, after that, the data team uses data modeling to get the best data prediction. Data Storytelling Finally, after the data model is ready, the data team utilizes the results to straddle the data insights to make better strategic decisions for the company.Moreover, the insights are usually presented in user-friendly language and visualized so that the decision-taker can reference them and use them to accelerate the companys growth. History of Data Science Danish Computer Scientist Peter Naur introduced the term in 1974. Before the term was named, John Tukey, a mathematician, and statistician mentioned data analysis used statistics and computers to get a measurable solution to a problem that would take longer than manual calculations. Similarly, In 1977, the International Association for Statistical Computing was established with a mission to link traditional statistical methodology with modern computer technology to generate outcomes that are converted into knowledge to help make a decision. In 1989, the creators established the first workshop for Knowledge Discovery in Databases, later known as the ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining. In 1999, the CAO of DMWAY analytics, Jacob Zahavi noticed and realized the need to store as well as handle large-scale data. Moreover, Software-as-a-Service SaaS was created in 2000 to enable the new world of cloud-based applications. Some major marks in data science history were in: The year 2002: The International Council for Science: Committee on Data for Science and Technology began publishing the Data Science Journal. The year 2006: Hadoop, an open-source, non-relational database, was released The year 2009: NoSQL was reintroduced. The Year 2011: Job Listings for Data scientists increased by 150 times, and data science was the buzzword. The Year 2015: Using Machine Learning, Googles speech recognition had a significant improvement. Data Science Applications In the modern digital world, there are enormous applications of the field. We have mentioned a few of the important ones below: Health Care: Data science plays a leading role in healthcare advancements. Likewise, different tools and machine learning solutions have helped medical operators detect several diseases before its critical. Moreover, it has helped save the lives of thousands of individuals through early diagnosis of different heart and lung diseases. Digital Advertising Digital advertising is upgrading to a whole new standard with the help of data along with machine learning. Similarly, the machine learning algorithm models target the audience interested in the advertised products or services. Almost every social media and search engine utilizes data to target their advertisements. Fraud detection Data science has helped hundreds of online businesses together with individuals by rejecting suspicious transaction attempts through fraud detection. Likewise, multiple email services use fraud detection algorithms to analyze spam emails which helps to minimize fraud. Recommendation Systems Social media, e-commerce, OTT, and Music Streaming software use data-generating tools with machine learning to recommend the most likely results that fulfill the users intent. Reportedly, with the help of the recommender system, amazon sales have increased by over 29.Moreover, machine learning together with Data Science can upgrade almost any digital system. Likewise, other applications of recommender systems are image detection, autopilot in cars, smartwatch health systems, etc. Conclusion Wrapping it up. Data science is being utilized by almost every large company to its advantage. Therefore, this field of education has great potential and a bright career path to choose if you are interested. Do read our other blogs to understand more about data science. Posted in data science Post navigation Previous: How to become a data scientist? prompt: Summarize this general content: Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser At Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser At Sunway College Posted on August 26, 2022November 11, 2022 by admin At Sunway College Kathmandu, our IT and research club has developed a creative IoT Based Water dispenser. The Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser senses when we place a puri below its dispenser pipe, the devices sense the object and fill the puri with a flavored panipuri drink. This gadget has been the pride of Sunway college and also a major source of attraction at different events. Lets know more details on the devices used, the building process, and the working mechanism of this tech from our student Sabin Shrestha. Hello, my name is Sabin Shrestha, and Im now enrolled in the third semester at Sunway College Kathmandu, Nepal. There are many automated devices developed and researched today utilizing IoT. IoT has already made life simpler for us in several ways. It greatly influences how we live our daily lives. However, this initiative is just another one that solicits donations. The project is an automated Panipuri water dispenser, as one would assume from the name. What actually is an Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser? An automated PaniPuri water dispenser is a gadget that delivers flavored water in specified amounts by automatically sensing the Puri without manual effort. The panipuris flavored water is dispensed using this technique. The system uses electronic components such as an Arduino, a breadboard, a jumper, a relay, and an adjustable IR sensor. The system works on the straightforward premise of detecting an item beneath the sensor and signaling the relay to activate the switch. Devices used Keywords: Arduino, IoT, Relay, Adjustable IR Sensor Benefits of automatic water dispenser Not just for panipuri, this device is usable in many fields. Below are a few benefits of having an automatic water dispenser: Portable Less amount of human effort Fetch the flavored water automatically Less use of the hand. Conventional Increase sales Working Process of the Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser The device follows 5 different steps to dispense flavored water. Lets break it down and understand. Turn on the device Sense Objects Arduino receives data from the sensor Transmits signals to the relay to turn on the dispenser Fetch flavored water. Methodology of developing an automatic water dispenser The methodology consists of the following steps for making this project real: Research and survey: Research is crucial to any project. Before starting this project, first and foremost we researched past works, designs, and projects. Other, comparable devices, such as automatic sanitizers, have been the subject of research. System Design: In system design, we design the device considering its architecture, shape, and size. Also, We also list out the components for the system and plan the system operation and hardware requirements for the project. Additionally, we designed a 3D print. Software Implementation In the software implementation process, we create Arduino code in the Arduino IDE according to the design and upload the code to Arduino for prototyping and testing. Prototyping  Testing In, Prototyping and testing phase, we test the working of the device with a small developed prototype. Device and component integration: After the prototype, we integrate all devices and components per design and code. The materials such as Arduino, an Adjustable IR Sensor, jumper wires, wires, a USB charger, pipe, wiring strips, 12 v chargers, stalls, etc. Data collection  Analysis In this stage, we gather data and analyze it as necessary. From our analysis, we found, that the object should be 56 cm away to sense by the system. And, It takes 3 seconds to get the flavor-infused water from the bucket once the thing is discovered. Result In the result phase, we gather the outcome. As a consequence, we validate if the system operates as intended. Although the dispenser has to be cleaned every day while it is in use. But the good thing is, This project is working and put into action effectively. Conclusion The Automated Panipuri water dispenser is a gadget that senses the Puri and automatically fetches the flavor-infused water. This method can be handy in restaurants, cafes, hotels, etc. Moreover, the gadget has several benefits as we discussed, and is frequently used for automated dispensing in Nepal and other nations too. prompt: Summarize this general content: How does the TikTok algorithm work?
completion: How does the For You algorithm work in TikTok? Posted on October 13, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin Have you ever wondered how the TikTok algorithm work? Let us review and understand. TikTok is addictive. It is so addictive that 9 out of 10 users on TikTok use it daily for hours. How do we spend hours on TikTok, even if its a short-content platform? Lets understand how the TikTok For You algorithm works. We will also cover how the basic recommendation algorithm works. Working of TikTok For You Page Recommendation Algorithm Before going in depth on how the TikTok algorithm works, let us understand the metadata. Metadata is the data that provides information about the data. This data helps identify and categorize the content for various backend purposes. Metadata of TikTok Videos Hashtags Hashtags are a few phrases attached to the end of the captions so they can help the algorithm understand the content type. The video uploader usually chooses this. Hashtags are better for a new content creator because they help TikTok identify the type of content theyre uploading. Music TikToks are frequently associated with music. TikTok made a significant move by using copyrighted music as a streaming platform, allowing creators to attach sounds without fear of copyright infringement. The music we choose for a TikTok video categorizes it as well, making it one of the more important pieces of metadata. Content-Duration TikTok is slowly increasing its video content duration limit. The platform started with a 15-second video uploaded over 10 minutes today. The length of the video also categorizes it, making it metadata for a TikTok video. Creator The creator uploading the content is by far the most critical metadata to categorize TikTok videos. Similarly, other metadata such as uploaded time, location, date, and video quality are a few other examples of metadata for a TikTok video. Consumer Ratings on TikTok When a video is released, TikTok usually sends it to all of its active users at once, who are usually chosen based on the metadata of the video that they are watching. Implicit Ratings Implicit ratings are ratings that occur as a result of behavior and cannot be faked by the user. For example, ordering a product from an online store. A few implicit ratings for TikTok videos are: View Time: During the initial video shoot, TikTok closely monitors the average watch duration of the video. There is a trend of looping a TikTok video so that the end can be unnoticed; the clever creator does it so that the watch duration exceeds the actual content duration, signaling the TikTok algorithm. Video Skips: A video viewer usually skips a video when they dont like it. This can be an important signal for TikTok to stop recommending the video that has been skipped and instead recommend some other content category. Profile Visit When consumers like the video, they usually visit the creators profile. This can count as an implicit rating as the user is indicating that they like the creator and want to consume similar content. Explicit Ratings Explicit ratings are the ratings that the user explicitly creates, which means theres some effort in creating explicit ratings. For example, liking a TikTok video A few explicit ratings for TikTok videos are: Likes: The user usually double-taps when they like the content, this helps to increase the likes count for a video and helps the algorithm. Comments: A comment on a video can act as a powerful explicit rating if there is more time and effort required to do so. prompt: Summarize this general content: How does the TikTok algorithm work?
completion: How does the For You algorithm work in TikTok? Posted on October 13, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin Have you ever wondered how the TikTok algorithm work? Let us review and understand. TikTok is addictive. It is so addictive that 9 out of 10 users on TikTok use it daily for hours. How do we spend hours on TikTok, even if its a short-content platform? Lets understand how the TikTok For You algorithm works. We will also cover how the basic recommendation algorithm works. Working of TikTok For You Page Recommendation Algorithm Before going in depth on how the TikTok algorithm works, let us understand the metadata. Metadata is the data that provides information about the data. This data helps identify and categorize the content for various backend purposes. Metadata of TikTok Videos Hashtags Hashtags are a few phrases attached to the end of the captions so they can help the algorithm understand the content type. The video uploader usually chooses this. Hashtags are better for a new content creator because they help TikTok identify the type of content theyre uploading. Music TikToks are frequently associated with music. TikTok made a significant move by using copyrighted music as a streaming platform, allowing creators to attach sounds without fear of copyright infringement. The music we choose for a TikTok video categorizes it as well, making it one of the more important pieces of metadata. Content-Duration TikTok is slowly increasing its video content duration limit. The platform started with a 15-second video uploaded over 10 minutes today. The length of the video also categorizes it, making it metadata for a TikTok video. Creator The creator uploading the content is by far the most critical metadata to categorize TikTok videos. Similarly, other metadata such as uploaded time, location, date, and video quality are a few other examples of metadata for a TikTok video. Consumer Ratings on TikTok When a video is released, TikTok usually sends it to all of its active users at once, who are usually chosen based on the metadata of the video that they are watching. Implicit Ratings Implicit ratings are ratings that occur as a result of behavior and cannot be faked by the user. For example, ordering a product from an online store. A few implicit ratings for TikTok videos are: View Time: During the initial video shoot, TikTok closely monitors the average watch duration of the video. There is a trend of looping a TikTok video so that the end can be unnoticed; the clever creator does it so that the watch duration exceeds the actual content duration, signaling the TikTok algorithm. Video Skips: A video viewer usually skips a video when they dont like it. This can be an important signal for TikTok to stop recommending the video that has been skipped and instead recommend some other content category. Profile Visit When consumers like the video, they usually visit the creators profile. This can count as an implicit rating as the user is indicating that they like the creator and want to consume similar content. Explicit Ratings Explicit ratings are the ratings that the user explicitly creates, which means theres some effort in creating explicit ratings. For example, liking a TikTok video A few explicit ratings for TikTok videos are: Likes: The user usually double-taps when they like the content, this helps to increase the likes count for a video and helps the algorithm. Comments: A comment on a video can act as a powerful explicit rating if there is more time and effort required to do so. Shares: Shares are also one of the most powerful explicit ratings as it is one of the rarest ratings, and parallelly, it also creates more exposure for the content. How TikTok algorithm work in recommended videos? As we have understood all the following terms, now we can understand how TikTok algorithm work to recommended videos. Step 2: TikTok distributes the video to a few active users in order to collect preliminary consumption data. Step 3: TikTok typically suggests the video to users who are watching other similarly category videos based on implicit and explicit ratings for the video. Step 4: Unless and until the consumption results begin to decline, TikTok will continue to recommend videos to users. In conclusion, TikTok is a video-editing app that sends videos to a few active users to collect initial consumption results. Based on implicit and explicit ratings for the video, TikTok usually recommends the content to users who are consuming similar videos. Unless and until the consumption results begin to decline, TikTok will continue to recommend videos to users. A message from the Sunway Social media and its uses have spread like wildfire lately. prompt: Summarize this general content: December 2022 - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Month: December 2022 Social Media Marketing: Why is it Important? Posted on December 19, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin Today, businesses of all sizes and industries require a powerful social media presence. The platform provides easy access to targeted audiences, making it the most effective digital marketing tool. This form of marketing creates awareness, recognition, and interaction between customers and brands. Why is Social Media Marketing Important in 2023? There are many reasons to use social networking sites but most of these are directly or indirectly related to promotion and branding. Social media marketing is part of a corporate marketing plan that contributes more to your marketing and sales than any other marketing medium. It is a platform to engage with your friends and family. Based on similar reasons that individuals use their social handles, here are some reasons to use them for your marketing campaign: Tell your brands story Connect with your audience Analyze customers and competitors Promote your brand, product, and services with ads Social Media Marketing For Storytelling About Your Brand Social media is a platform where your presence can help you build your brand. Your online interaction with your customers allows you to tell your brand story and build trust. Regular content postings on such platforms give your brand more exposure and slowly introduce it to a broader audience. Building A Connection With Your Audience Regular engagement builds a strong connection between you and your customers. It helps them prioritize your product and service over other brands as they are more attached to you and are aware of your product and policies. Connection with your audience helps you grow your business, improve product quality, and gain valuable feedback. Social Media Marketing for Analyzing Customers and Competitors You can learn your customers purchase behaviors, including the topics that interest them. It will help you improve your product and marketing strategies. Promoting Your Brand, Product, and Services with Ads All popular social platforms have paid marketing features. You can use your existing audience on the platform to target them with personalized ads or target similar audiences. Content Marketing As Part Of Social Media Marketing Marketers use content marketing as a part of their marketing strategy to improve the brand customers trust and credibility. It involves using a variety of engaging content formats, such as blogs, articles, videos, infographics, posts, and more which engages and aware the audience regarding the brands products and services. Final Words In a nutshell, Social Media Marketing is crucial for leveraging the business platform and inducing growth. Social Media Marketing can be done by setting up an in-house team or by hiring an external marketing agency; however, big corporations have both in-house teams as well as work with external marketing agencies. Some of the prominent Marketing Agencies in Nepal you can work with in Nepal are : 1. Infinity Digital Agency 2. Elance Digital Media 3. Ideajar 4. Wizonbiz Digital and Many more To set up an in-house team, it is important to recruit marketers that are technically and academically qualified. In the world of Social Media, it is crucial to hire someone in the Social Media Marketing team who has a good grasp of marketing concepts along with a remarkable knowledge of how marketing works in the digital sphere. In Nepal, there is a strong need for technically and academically sound marketers; however, there is also a lack of academic courses dedicated to Digital Marketing. prompt: Summarize this general content: November 2022 - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Month: November 2022 All you need to know about BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Scope  Placements  Career Posted on November 6, 2022June 9, 2023 by admin BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Overview Sunway College Kathmandu in academic partnership with Birmingham City University BCU, offers BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Let us have complete information about our computer science and artificial intelligence course, its syllabus, scope, career, salary, and placement. What is BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems. Artificial Intelligence is a complicated field of study, but you can become an expert in one of its subfields with the right amount of learning, guidance, and training. Why BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? The BscHons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence degree provides you with a broad understanding of Machine Learning, AI, and Neural Networks. The program also prepares you with concepts like computer programming, database, data analysis, visualization, data structure and algorithms, and cyber security. This makes you a skilled and competitive candidate for a data science job. This course gives you hands-on experience in the artificial intelligence and data science field before you graduate. To ensure you get real experience of the workspace we have incorporated industry internship in our program. We work closely with industrial partners to safeguard your internship program. The right time to pursue an Artificial Intelligence career The recent advances in digitization have made Artificial Intelligence a very promising field. Why? Because we have access to the right resources and tools for extracting information from the data using various AI algorithms. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence  Eligibility Criteria and Entrance Exams To be an AI expert requires a great logical understanding and AIML concepts. You need to learn computer programming and understand machine learning, and some major artificial intelligence tools and techniques. Our eligibility criteria to join a data science course is pretty straightforward. Youll need at least a GPA of 3.0 in your 2 or equivalent degree to qualify for this course. We will take a brief entrance exam that helps us understand your interest and your understanding of computer programming and data science. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Syllabus and Subject Our BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence program provides you with a complete understanding of every Artificial Intelligence concept. A solid academic foundation in Machine learning and AI tools is combined with in-depth digital expertise in real-world projects? And an incorporated internship in our program with our MoU partners so you can adapt and experience working in the full-fledged AI expert team. Our 9 months of professional placement will for sure help you become industry ready before you graduate. Still not sure if you will make it into the Artificial Intelligence Program? Well, we can help you decide for yourself. How do I know I am made for BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence? You may find yourself confused by a range of possible career options, but we have compiled a list of tips that can help you identify if youre suited to the field of artificial Intelligence. You love Mathematics and Analytics A better mathematician is better at creating and optimizing logic. You definitely also like to analyze insights, work with probabilities, and perform other similar logical tasks. You already know how to code or youre learning If you already understand object-oriented programming and database concepts, or learn them. You are already preparing for a good data career ahead. You think easy solutions to complicated problems A better data scientist is one who can solve complicated problems with algorithms and data science. If you can think of a solution to tough problems, data science is for you. You are thrilled with AI and Machine Learning Most importantly, if you want to talk about AI and machine learning every time and everywhere, you are made for data science. Skill Sets Required for Pursuing Artificial Intelligence Career Interested in pursuing a career in artificial intelligence? Weve compiled a list of the skills that matter most. Programming Skill Programmingcoding is a primary skill to work in data science. You are required to learn one of the programming languages such as Python or R to get valued at a data science job interview. Data Warehousing and ETL tools. As a data engineer, youll deal with a massive amount of data. Youll need to use a data warehousing service to store and analyze such data. ETL Extract Transform Load tools help you to extract data from multiple sources to store it in your data warehouse. So, Data Warehouse and ETL tools are important to learn. Database Systems This again comes to data. You must understand multiple database systems. Youll need to run different database queries to extract or filter out data from a big pool of collected data. Understanding SQL and NoSQL-based databases is a must to work in a data science field. Data Analytics You must know how to analyze data to extract information from it. As a data scientist, you must know how to use industry data analytics tools. Understanding of Machine Learning As a data scientist, you use machine learning to build data models and analyze the data statistically. Even if you work as a data engineer, a brief understanding of how machine learning works can help you work efficiently with the team. Critical thinking for a Solution Data science is followed to get a solution to the problem through analyzing the data. You should develop a habit of thinking of a solution. You should know how to choose different dimensions of data points that can solve the problem most efficiently. Multiple Operating System As a data engineer, youll work with multiple sources of data, software, IoT devices, and cloud servers. Therefore, its good to have experience using operating systems like Linux, Windows, and Mac OS. Data Engineering Educational Backgrounds A data engineering academic background is preferred but not a compulsion to work in a data science field. You can also work on various open-source personal projects to prove your skills if you dont want to follow the academic route to work in the data science field. BSc Hons Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence: Scope and Top Recruiters Similar to a digital marketing career, there is an immense scope of data science and artificial intelligence. There is the freedom to work in any industry, anytime and anywhere as a data scientist. Every commercial company requires decision-making. Every large corporation, nonprofit, bank, eCommerce, shopping mall, school, or college regularly conducts meetings and planning. The companys growth is very dependent on the decisions. As a data engineer, youll deal with a massive amount of data. Youll need to use a data warehousing service to store and analyze such data. ETL Extract Transform Load tools help you to extract data from multiple sources to store it in your data warehouse. So, Data Warehouse and ETL tools are important to learn.
