Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino  Ultrasonic Censor Posted on July 6, 2023January 26, 2024 by admin In todays rapidly evolving digital landscape, the Internet of Things IoT has emerged as a transformative force, connecting various physical devices and enabling them to communicate and share data seamlessly. At Sunway College Kathmandu, we recognize the significance of IoT and its potential to revolutionize numerous industries. Our dedicated IoT team supports students in exploring and creating innovative projects, turning their ideas into reality. One remarkable creation by our talented IT and research team is the IoT-Based Obstacle-Avoiding Car. At Sunway College Kathmandu, we are committed to empowering our students with the knowledge and practical skills needed to excel in the realm of IoT. Lets have a good insight into IoT-Based Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car. Introduction In recent years, the advancement of technology has revolutionized the automotive industry, paving the way for intelligent and autonomous vehicles. One such development is the automatic obstacle-avoiding car, which utilizes various components like Arduino, Arduino Motor Shield, HC-05 Bluetooth module, Ultrasonic sensor, and voice detection using Android to create a sophisticated and efficient system. This research paper aims to explore the design, implementation, and functionality of such a car, highlighting its potential applications and benefits. Overview of the System Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino and Ultrasonic Sensor for Intelligent Navigation is a smart vehicle that can autonomously detect obstacles in its path and navigate accordingly. The system integrates multiple components to achieve its functionality: Arduino: Arduino is an open-source microcontroller platform that serves as the brain of the car. It provides an interface between the various modules and sensors, allowing them to communicate and work together efficiently. Arduino Motor Shield: The Arduino Motor Shield is an add-on board that enables the control of multiple motors simultaneously. It allows precise control over the cars movement, including speed, direction, and rotation. HC-05 Bluetooth Module: The HC-05 Bluetooth module facilitates wireless communication between the car and an Android device. It enables remote control of the vehicle, adding an element of convenience and versatility to the system. Ultrasonic Sensor: The ultrasonic sensor plays a crucial role in obstacle detection. By emitting ultrasonic waves and measuring the time taken for the waves to bounce back, the sensor can determine the distance between the car and any obstruction in its path. System Design and Implementation To implement the automatic obstacle-avoiding car, the following steps are involved: Hardware Setup Connect the Arduino board to the Arduino Motor Shield and mount it on the car chassis. Attach the ultrasonic sensor to the front of the car, ensuring it has a clear line of sight. Connect the HC-05 Bluetooth module to the Arduino board for wireless communication. Set up the Android device to establish a connection with the HC-05 module. 2. Software Development Write the Arduino code to control the motor movements based on the input received from the ultrasonic sensor. Develop an Android application that communicates with the car via Bluetooth. Implement voice recognition capabilities in the Android application using libraries or APIs. System Functionality Once the system is set up, it can perform the following functions: Obstacle Detection and Avoidance: The ultrasonic sensor continuously measures the distance to nearby objects. If an obstacle is detected within a certain range, the Arduino board instructs the motors to stop or change direction to avoid a collision. Bluetooth Control: Through the Android application, the user can control the car wirelessly. They can send commands to move the car forward, backward, left, or right. The Arduino board receives these commands via the HC-05 module and executes the corresponding motor movements. Applications and Benefits The automatic obstacle-avoiding car has various practical applications and benefits, including: Education and Research: This project serves as an excellent educational tool for students and hobbyists interested in robotics, automation, and embedded systems. It provides hands-on experience in assembling and programming a complex system, fostering a deeper understanding of engineering concepts. Additionally, researchers can utilize the car to explore advancements in autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance algorithms. Indoor Navigation and Surveillance: The automatic obstacle-avoiding car can be employed in indoor environments such as warehouses, hospitals, or museums for surveillance or navigation purposes. It can autonomously navigate through the premises, avoiding obstacles and collecting valuable data or performing monitoring tasks. Assistive Technology: The cars obstacle detection and avoidance capabilities make it suitable for assistive technology applications. For individuals with mobility impairments, it can act as a robotic aid, helping them navigate safely through their environment. By integrating voice commands, it offers an intuitive and accessible means of control. Entertainment and Gaming: The cars wireless control and voice recognition features make it an engaging platform for entertainment and gaming applications. Users can enjoy controlling the car remotely using their Android device, competing in obstacle courses, or participating in interactive games that require precise movements and quick responses. Prototyping and Development: The automatic obstacle-avoiding car serves as a prototyping platform for testing and developing algorithms and functionalities for autonomous vehicles. It provides a cost-effective and customizable solution for evaluating navigation strategies, sensor fusion techniques, and human-machine interaction interfaces. Conclusion Automatic Obstacle-Avoiding Car with Arduino and Ultrasonic Sensor for Intelligent Navigation using Arduino, Arduino Motor Shield, HC-05, Ultrasonic Sensor, and voice detection using Android presents an innovative and practical solution for autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance. Combining these components offers a versatile and interactive platform for education, research, indoor navigation, assistive technology, entertainment, and prototyping. The integration of Bluetooth control and voice recognition further enhances the user experience, making the car more accessible and convenient to operate. With continued advancements in technology, this project opens up new possibilities for intelligent and autonomous vehicles in various domains. This remarkable project showcases the potential of IoT technology in creating intelligent and autonomous systems. Through our dedicated IoT team, we provide our students with the necessary support and resources to explore their ideas and turn them into tangible realities. Join us at Sunway College Kathmandu to unlock your potential in the exciting world of IoT. Apply Now! prompt: Summarize this general content: 10 Reasons to Study Data Science - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: 10 Reasons to Study Data Science Posted on August 3, 2023August 3, 2023 by admin You are interested in Data Science but still dont have any idea or reason behind choosing Data Science! Dont worry because choosing Data Science as an undergraduate major can be a rewarding decision for several reasons. Here are ten compelling reasons why you should consider studying data science at the undergraduate level: High demand and career opportunities: Data science abilities are in increasing demand across sectors. A degree in data science gives up a wide range of job prospects in industries such as technology, finance, healthcare, marketing, and more. Interdisciplinary nature: Data science combines mathematical, statistical, computer science, and domain-specific knowledge concepts. It provides a well-rounded education that prepares you for various positions and allows you to engage in multidisciplinary projects. Problem-solving and analytical skills: Data science teaches you problem-solving and analytical abilities. Youll learn how to extract, clean, analyze, and understand vast and complicated datasets, allowing you to make data-driven choices and solve real-world challenges. Competitive edge: With the rising relevance of data-driven decision-making, having a degree in data science provides you with a competitive advantage in the employment market. Employers respect employees who can successfully deal with data and get insightful conclusions. Versatility and flexibility: Data science abilities are adaptable and transferable across domains. A data science education allows you to work in a broad spectrum of areas, whether youre interested in banking, healthcare, environmental sciences, or any other. Innovation and impact: Data science is critical for fostering innovation and making a positive difference. You may help progress technology, corporate strategy, social efforts, and other areas by utilizing the power of data. Continuous learning and growth: The subject of data science is continually growing, providing chances for ongoing learning and progress. As a data scientist, youll need to keep up with the newest technologies, methodologies, and industry trends to keep your skills current. Collaboration and teamwork: Collaboration among professionals from diverse backgrounds, including domain experts, programmers, and analysts, is prevalent in data science initiatives. A degree in data science helps you to improve your collaboration and communication abilities, allowing you to work effectively in diverse teams. Ethical consideration: Data science brings fundamental ethical concerns about data privacy, prejudice, and openness. Undergraduate studies in data science provide you with the information and critical thinking skills needed to manage these ethical dilemmas ethically. Impactful storytelling and visualization: Data scientists not only evaluate data but also effectively convey their results. Youll learn how to tell captivating tales using data visualization, making difficult information accessible and entertaining by studying data science. These considerations illustrate the significance and possible effect of getting an undergraduate degree in data science. When choosing an academic career, keep your interests, talents, and long-term objectives in mind. We are confident that our guidance and inspiration have played a significant role in your decision to pursue Data Science as a field of study and a potential career path. Notice from Sunway College Considering the rising demand in the data science field in Nepal. We have introduced a BSc Hons in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Our specialized course with an academic partnership with Birmingham City University BCU, will cover topics on Computer programming, data structures, cyber security, artificial intelligence, neural networks, and all topics that will be helpful in your career as a data scientist. Moreover, our team of field experts will guide you with their industry experience. Feel free to learn more here. prompt: Summarize this general content: 10 Reasons to Study Data Science - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: 10 Reasons to Study Data Science Posted on August 3, 2023August 3, 2023 by admin You are interested in Data Science but still dont have any idea or reason behind choosing Data Science! Dont worry because choosing Data Science as an undergraduate major can be a rewarding decision for several reasons. Here are ten compelling reasons why you should consider studying data science at the undergraduate level: High demand and career opportunities: Data science abilities are in increasing demand across sectors. A degree in data science gives up a wide range of job prospects in industries such as technology, finance, healthcare, marketing, and more. Interdisciplinary nature: Data science combines mathematical, statistical, computer science, and domain-specific knowledge concepts. It provides a well-rounded education that prepares you for various positions and allows you to engage in multidisciplinary projects. Problem-solving and analytical skills: Data science teaches you problem-solving and analytical abilities. Youll learn how to extract, clean, analyze, and understand vast and complicated datasets, allowing you to make data-driven choices and solve real-world challenges. Competitive edge: With the rising relevance of data-driven decision-making, having a degree in data science provides you with a competitive advantage in the employment market. Employers respect employees who can successfully deal with data and get insightful conclusions. Versatility and flexibility: Data science abilities are adaptable and transferable across domains. A data science education allows you to work in a broad spectrum of areas, whether youre interested in banking, healthcare, environmental sciences, or any other. Innovation and impact: Data science is critical for fostering innovation and making a positive difference. You may help progress technology, corporate strategy, social efforts, and other areas by utilizing the power of data. Continuous learning and growth: The subject of data science is continually growing, providing chances for ongoing learning and progress. As a data scientist, youll need to keep up with the newest technologies, methodologies, and industry trends to keep your skills current. Collaboration and teamwork: Collaboration among professionals from diverse backgrounds, including domain experts, programmers, and analysts, is prevalent in data science initiatives. A degree in data science helps you to improve your collaboration and communication abilities, allowing you to work effectively in diverse teams. Ethical consideration: Data science brings fundamental ethical concerns about data privacy, prejudice, and openness. Undergraduate studies in data science provide you with the information and critical thinking skills needed to manage these ethical dilemmas ethically. Impactful storytelling and visualization: Data scientists not only evaluate data but also effectively convey their results. Youll learn how to tell captivating tales using data visualization, making difficult information accessible and entertaining by studying data science. These considerations illustrate the significance and possible effect of getting an undergraduate degree in data science. When choosing an academic career, keep your interests, talents, and long-term objectives in mind. We are confident that our guidance and inspiration have played a significant role in your decision to pursue Data Science as a field of study and a potential career path. Notice from Sunway College Considering the rising demand in the data science field in Nepal. We have introduced a BSc Hons in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Our specialized course with an academic partnership with Birmingham City University BCU, will cover topics on Computer programming, data structures, cyber security, artificial intelligence, neural networks, and all topics that will be helpful in your career as a data scientist. Moreover, our team of field experts will guide you with their industry experience. Feel free to learn more here. prompt: Summarize this general content: Analyzing Netflix Movie Trends: Are Movies Getting Shorter?
completion: Analyzing Netflix Movie Trends: Are Movies Getting Shorter? Posted on September 27, 2023September 27, 2023 by Simoli Desai I recently conducted a data analysis project on Netflix movies, and Im excited to share some intriguing insights with you! In a world where binge-watching has become the norm, I set out to investigate whether movies on Netflix are getting shorter over time. The answer? Well, its not that straightforward.  Movie Duration Trends: While some movies have indeed become more concise, its essential to note that not all genres are following this trend. Heres what I discovered:  Decline in Length: Genres like Childrens and Documentaries have shown a decline in movie length. It seems that audiences in these categories are favoring shorter, more focused content.  Consistency: Interestingly, genres like Stand-up comedy have remained relatively consistent in their movie durations. This suggests that these genres are maintaining a stable viewing experience. Further Exploration: 1. Loading your friends data into a dictionary Netflix! What started in 1997 as a DVD rental service has since exploded into the largest entertainmentmedia company by market capitalization, boasting over 200 million subscribers as of January 2021. Given the large number of movies and series available on the platform, it is a perfect opportunity to flex our data manipulation skills and dive into the entertainment industry. Our friend has also been brushing up on their Python skills and has taken a first crack at a CSV file containing Netflix data. For their first order of business, they have been performing some analyses, and they believe that the average duration of movies has been declining. As evidence of this, they have provided us with the following information. For the years from 2011 to 2020, the average movie durations are 103, 101, 99, 100, 100, 95, 95, 96, 93, and 90, respectively. If were going to be working with this data, we know a good place to start would be to probably start working with pandas. But first well need to create a DataFrame from scratch. Lets start by creating a Python object covered in Intermediate Python: a dictionary! 2. Creating a DataFrame from a dictionary To convert our dictionary movie_dict to a pandas DataFrame, we will first need to import the library under its usual alias. Well also want to inspect our DataFrame to ensure it was created correctly. Lets perform these steps now. 3. A visual inspection of our data Alright, we now have a pandas DataFrame, the most common way to work with tabular data in Python. Now back to the task at hand. We want to follow up on our friends assertion that movie lengths have been decreasing over time. A great place to start will be a visualization of the data. Given that the data is continuous, a line plot would be a good choice, with the dates represented along the x-axis and the average length in minutes along the y-axis. This will allow us to easily spot any trends in movie durations. There are many ways to visualize data in Python, but matploblib.pyplot is one of the most common packages to do so. Note: In order for us to correctly test your plot, you will need to initalize a matplotlib.pyplot Figure object, which we have already provided in the cell below. You can continue to create your plot as you have learned in Intermediate Python. 4. Loading the rest of the data from a CSV Well, it looks like there is something to the idea that movie lengths have decreased over the past ten years! But equipped only with our friends aggregations, were limited in the further explorations we can perform. There are a few questions about this trend that we are currently unable to answer, including: What does this trend look like over a longer period of time? Is this explainable by something like the genre of entertainment? Upon asking our friend for the original CSV they used to perform their analyses, they gladly oblige and send it. We now have access to the CSV file, available at the path datasetsnetflix_data.csv. Lets create another DataFrame, this time with all of the data. Given the length of our friends data, printing the whole DataFrame is probably not a good idea, so we will inspect it by printing only the first five rows. 5. Filtering for movies! Okay, we have our data! Now we can dive in and start looking at movie lengths. Or can we? Looking at the first five rows of our new DataFrame, we notice a column type. Scanning the column, its clear there are also TV shows in the dataset! Moreover, the duration column we planned to use seems to represent different values depending on whether the row is a movie or a show perhaps the number of minutes versus the number of seasons? Fortunately, a DataFrame allows us to filter data quickly, and we can select rows where type is Movie. While were at it, we dont need information from all of the columns, so lets create a new DataFrame netflix_movies containing only title, country, genre, release_year, and duration. Lets put our data subsetting skills to work! 6. Creating a scatter plot Okay, now were getting somewhere. Weve read in the raw data, selected rows of movies, and have limited our DataFrame to our columns of interest. Lets try visualizing the data again to inspect the data over a longer range of time. This time, we are no longer working with aggregates but instead with individual movies. A line plot is no longer a good choice for our data, so lets try a scatter plot instead. We will again plot the year of release on the x-axis and the movie duration on the y-axis. 7. Digging deeper This is already much more informative than the simple plot we created when our friend first gave us some data. We can also see that, while newer movies are overrepresented on the platform, many short movies have been released in the past two decades. Upon further inspection, something else is going on. Some of these films are under an hour long! Lets filter our DataFrame for movies with a duration under 60 minutes and look at the genres. This might give us some insight into what is dragging down the average. 8. Marking non-feature films Interesting! It looks as though many of the films that are under 60 minutes fall into genres such as Children, Stand-Up, and Documentaries. This is a logical result, as these types of films are probably often shorter than 90 minute Hollywood blockbuster. We could eliminate these rows from our DataFrame and plot the values again. But another interesting way to explore the effect of these genres on our data would be to plot them, but mark them with a different color. In Python, there are many ways to do this, but one fun way might be to use a loop to generate a list of colors based on the contents of the genre column. Much as we did in Intermediate Python, we can then pass this list to our plotting function in a later step to color all non-typical genres in a different color! Note: Although we are using the basic colors of red, blue, green, and black, matplotlib has many named colors you can use when creating plots. For more information, you can refer to the documentation here! 9. Plotting with color! Lovely looping! We now have a colors list that we can pass to our scatter plot, which should allow us to visually inspect whether these genres might be responsible for the decline in the average duration of movies. This time, well also spruce up our plot with some additional axis labels and a new theme with plt.style.use. The latter isnt taught in Intermediate Python, but can be a fun way to add some visual flair to a basic matplotlib plot. You can find more information on customizing the style of your plot here! 10. What next? Well, as we suspected, non-typical genres such as childrens movies and documentaries are all clustered around the bottom half of the plot. But we cant know for certain until we perform additional analyses. Congratulations, youve performed an exploratory analysis of some entertainment data, and there are lots of fun ways to develop your skills as a Pythonic data scientist. These include learning how to analyze data further with statistics, creating more advanced visualizations, and perhaps most importantly, learning more advanced ways of working with data in pandas. This latter skill is covered in our fantastic course Data Manipulation with pandas. We hope you enjoyed this application of the skills learned in Intermediate Python, and wish you all the best on the rest of your journey! -Bishesh Giri Posted in student blog Post navigation Previous: Partner Institutions with DigiSchool  UK CollegesNext: Study in Nepal with ECAN SoftEd IT Scholarship Leave a Reply Cancel replyYour email address will not be published. Required fields are marked Comment  Name  Email  Website Save my name, email, and website in this browser for the next time I comment. prompt: Summarize this general content: Study IT with up to 100 Scholarship in Nepal  Learn How!
completion: Study IT with up to 100 Scholarship in Nepal  Learn How! Posted on September 11, 2023September 12, 2023 by Simoli Desai For recent 2 graduates of Nepals top colleges, venturing into the world of Information Technology IT is an exciting prospect. The thriving global IT industry offers a wealth of opportunities, spanning diverse roles from software developers to network engineers, cybersecurity analysts, data scientists, and beyond. Recognizing the immense potential within these aspiring young individuals, Sunway College Kathmandu in collaboration with DigiSchool, proudly introduces the Merit-Based IT Scholarship for 2 graduate students, a prestigious initiative valued at Rs.2 crores. This scholarship not only empowers these individuals to venture into the rapidly expanding technology sector but also actively nurtures their potential, fostering talent and innovation while ensuring accessible, high-quality IT education. Moreover, keeping the vision of creating AI leaders at the forefront, Sunway College Kathmandu proudly presents the prestigious BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence AI program in academic partnership with Birmingham City University, UK. This academic partnership not only unlocks doors but also propels aspiring IT professionals towards excellence in the dynamic realm of technology, significantly elevating their prospects for success. Keep reading to discover further details about the Merit Based IT Scholarship What is Merit Based IT Scholarship? The Merit Based IT Scholarship is a prestigious initiative by Sunway College Kathmandu in collaboration with DigiSchool in Nepal. This scholarship is exclusively designed for 2 graduates who want to study for a Bachelors Degree in the IT sector. Moreover, it is open to students who have recently completed their 2 studies in any subject from our esteemed DigiSchool partner institutions. Likewise, this scholarship is for students who have a strong passion for pursuing a career in the diverse and dynamic realm of Information Technology IT, which encompasses a wide range of exciting careers such as software development, network engineering, cybersecurity analysis, data science artificial intelligence, cloud computing and more. Moreover, this scholarship program serves as a powerful initiative to inspire and empower young individuals, fostering their aspirations, and motivation in the world of technology. Who is eligible for the Merit Based IT Scholarship? The Scholarship program, offered by Sunway College Kathmandu in collaboration with DigiSchool in Nepal, is for recent 2 graduates from our DigiSchool partners interested in IT careers. In Sunway College Kathmandu, this scholarship opportunity is specifically designed for students pursuing a BSc Hons in Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence AI. Verify if the college from which you graduated 2 is affiliated with DigiSchool as a partner institution. Click Here! As this is merit-based, it means that if you were among the high-achieving students during your college years with a GPA of 3.0 or higher, this scholarship can be your stepping stone. Moreover, there are different tiers of scholarships according to your grade, which are: 100 Scholarship: Seats: 2 Eligibility: Min 3.8 GPA followed by an interview for 100 scholarship. 50 Scholarship: Seats: 10 Eligibility: Min 3.5 GPA followed by an interview for 50 scholarship. 30 scholarship: Seats: 88 Eligibility: Min 3.0 GPA followed by an interview for 30 scholarship. How many scholarship seats are available for the Merit Based IT Scholarship program? There are a total of 100 scholarship seats available for the Merit Based IT Scholarship program. What is the deadline for applying to the scholarship program? The last date to apply for the scholarship program is September 17, 2023. How do you Apply for a Merit Based IT Scholarship? You can apply for a Merit Based IT Scholarship by Ensuring you meet the eligibility criteria , which include being a recent 2 graduate from one of our DigiSchool partner institutions and maintaining a GPA of 3.0 or higher. Visiting Sunway College Kathmandus website, and you will find an online scholarship application form. Fill out this form with accurate and up-to-date information. Be sure to double-check your entries to avoid any errors. Link for the Scholarship Registration Form Submitting your application after reviewing it to ensure all details are correct. After submitting the application, wait for evaluation. Our scholarship committee will carefully evaluate all applications submitted through the colleges website to identify deserving candidates based on merit. Additionally, applicants must demonstrate their English proficiency with the BCU recognized English Tests: IELTS 6.0 overall with 5.5 minimum in all bands In case of any confusion or if you have questions during the application process, please feel free to contact us directly through the provided contact details on our website. We are here to assist you. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sunway College Kathmandu sunwaycollegektm Why is this Scholarship Notable? The Merit Based IT Scholarship in collaboration with DigiSchool is not just a financial assistance program, it is a way to access quality education and start a remarkable journey in the world of Information Technology IT. Heres why this scholarship is truly exceptional: Investing in Your Dreams: This scholarship allows you to pursue your IT dreams without financial constraints. Whether its developing advanced software, creating innovative tech solutions, or diving into the world of artificial intelligence AI, this scholarship empowers you to follow your passion without the burden of tuition fees. Scholarship for Bachelor Degree in Nepal: If your dream is to establish a career in the IT field and study in Nepal, the Merit Based IT Scholarship is for you. This prestigious scholarship covers 100 of tuition fees and enables you to pursue fields like software development, network engineering, cybersecurity, data science, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence AI. Moreover, scholarship recipients gain exclusive access to enroll in Sunway College Kathmandus esteemed BSc Hons Computer Science with AI program, recognized as one of the top college programs in Nepal in the field of IT. BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence AI: As a recipient of this prestigious scholarship, you will have the exclusive opportunity to enrol in the British Degree BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence program offered at Sunway College Kathmandu. This program is affiliated with Birmingham City University in the UK, which holds a distinguished global ranking. This program teaches you specialised skills in AIa field thats growing rapidly. Its a four-year program, including a whole year of hands-on experience. By choosing this program, you put yourself at the forefront of the IT industry, ready to succeed in a field where innovation is key. Networking Opportunities: As a scholarship recipient, you will have the privilege of connecting with IT experts, mentors, and fellow scholars. These connections can open doors to exciting collaborations, career guidance, and valuable insights into the tech industrys ever-evolving landscape. Career Advancement: By earning the Merit Based IT Scholarship, you validate your skills and dedication to IT excellence. This recognition makes it easier to secure top-tier jobs in the dynamic IT sector. Prospective employers will readily acknowledge your distinction, giving you a competitive lead in the job market. completion: Month: September 2023 Analyzing Netflix Movie Trends: Are Movies Getting Shorter? Posted on September 27, 2023September 27, 2023 by Simoli Desai I recently conducted a data analysis project on Netflix movies, and Im excited to share some intriguing insights with you! In a world where binge-watching has become the norm, I set out to investigate whether movies on Netflix are getting shorter over time. The answer? Well, its not that straightforward.  Movie Duration Trends: While some movies have indeed become more concise, its essential to note that not all genres are following this trend. Heres what I discovered:  Decline in Length: Genres like Childrens and Documentaries have shown a decline in movie length. It seems that audiences in these categories are favoring shorter, more focused content.  Consistency: Interestingly, genres like Stand-up comedy have remained relatively consistent in their movie durations. This suggests that these genres are maintaining a stable viewing experience. Further Exploration: 1. Loading your friends data into a dictionary Netflix! What started in 1997 as a DVD rental service has since exploded into the largest entertainmentmedia company by market capitalization, boasting over 200 million subscribers as of January 2021. Given the large number of movies and series available on the platform, it is a perfect opportunity to flex our data manipulation skills and dive into the entertainment industry. Our friend has also been brushing up on their Python skills and has taken a first crack at a CSV file containing Netflix data. For their first order of business, they have been performing some analyses, and they believe that the average duration of movies has been declining. As evidence of this, they have provided us with the following information. For the years from 2011 to 2020, the average movie durations are 103, 101, 99, 100, 100, 95, 95, 96, 93, and 90, respectively. If were going to be working with this data, we know a good place to start would be to probably start working with pandas. But first well need to create a DataFrame from scratch. Lets start by creating a Python object covered in Intermediate Python: a dictionary! 2. Creating a DataFrame from a dictionary To convert our dictionary movie_dict to a pandas DataFrame, we will first need to import the library under its usual alias. Well also want to inspect our DataFrame to ensure it was created correctly. Lets perform these steps now. 3. A visual inspection of our data Alright, we now have a pandas DataFrame, the most common way to work with tabular data in Python. Now back to the task at hand. We want to follow up on our friends assertion that movie lengths have been decreasing over time. A great place to start will be a visualization of the data. Given that the data is continuous, a line plot would be a good choice, with the dates represented along the x-axis and the average length in minutes along the y-axis. This will allow us to easily spot any trends in movie durations. There are many ways to visualize data in Python, but matploblib.pyplot is one of the most common packages to do so. Note: In order for us to correctly test your plot, you will need to initalize a matplotlib.pyplot Figure object, which we have already provided in the cell below. You can continue to create your plot as you have learned in Intermediate Python. 4. Loading the rest of the data from a CSV Well, it looks like there is something to the idea that movie lengths have decreased over the past ten years! But equipped only with our friends aggregations, were limited in the further explorations we can perform. There are a few questions about this trend that we are currently unable to answer, including: What does this trend look like over a longer period of time? Is this explainable by something like the genre of entertainment? Upon asking our friend for the original CSV they used to perform their analyses, they gladly oblige and send it. We now have access to the CSV file, available at the path datasetsnetflix_data.csv. Lets create another DataFrame, this time with all of the data. Given the length of our friends data, printing the whole DataFrame is probably not a good idea, so we will inspect it by printing only the first five rows. 5. Filtering for movies! Okay, we have our data! Now we can dive in and start looking at movie lengths. Or can we? Looking at the first five rows of our new DataFrame, we notice a column type. Scanning the column, its clear there are also TV shows in the dataset! Moreover, the duration column we planned to use seems to represent different values depending on whether the row is a movie or a show perhaps the number of minutes versus the number of seasons? Fortunately, a DataFrame allows us to filter data quickly, and we can select rows where type is Movie. While were at it, we dont need information from all of the columns, so lets create a new DataFrame netflix_movies containing only title, country, genre, release_year, and duration. Lets put our data subsetting skills to work! 6. Creating a scatter plot Okay, now were getting somewhere. Weve read in the raw data, selected rows of movies, and have limited our DataFrame to our columns of interest. Lets try visualizing the data again to inspect the data over a longer range of time. This time, we are no longer working with aggregates but instead with individual movies. A line plot is no longer a good choice for our data, so lets try a scatter plot instead. We will again plot the year of release on the x-axis and the movie duration on the y-axis. 7. Digging deeper This is already much more informative than the simple plot we created when our friend first gave us some data. We can also see that, while newer movies are overrepresented on the platform, many short movies have been released in the past two decades. Upon further inspection, something else is going on. Some of these films are under an hour long! Lets filter our DataFrame for movies with a duration under 60 minutes and look at the genres. This might give us some insight into what is dragging down the average. 8. Marking non-feature films Interesting! It looks as though many of the films that are under 60 minutes fall into genres such as Children, Stand-Up, and Documentaries. This is a logical result, as these types of films are probably often shorter than 90 minute Hollywood blockbuster. We could eliminate these rows from our DataFrame and plot the values again. But another interesting way to explore the effect of these genres on our data would be to plot them, but mark them with a different color. In Python, there are many ways to do this, but one fun way might be to use a loop to generate a list of colors based on the contents of the genre column. Much as we did in Intermediate Python, we can then pass this list to our plotting function in a later step to color all non-typical genres in a different color! Note: Although we are using the basic colors of red, blue, green, and black, matplotlib has many named colors you can use when creating plots. For more information, you can refer to the documentation here! 9. Plotting with color! Lovely looping! We now have a colors list that we can pass to our scatter plot, which should allow us to visually inspect whether these genres might be responsible for the decline in the average duration of movies. This time, well also spruce up our plot with some additional axis labels and a new theme with plt.style.use. The latter isnt taught in Intermediate Python, but can be a fun way to add some visual flair to a basic matplotlib plot. You can find more information on customizing the style of your plot here! 10. What next? Well, as we suspected, non-typical genres such as childrens movies and documentaries are all clustered around the bottom half of the plot. But we cant know for certain until we perform additional analyses. Congratulations, youve performed an exploratory analysis of some entertainment data, and there are lots of fun ways to develop your skills as a Pythonic data scientist. These include learning how to analyze data further with statistics, creating more advanced visualizations, and perhaps most importantly, learning more advanced ways of working with data in pandas. This latter skill is covered in our fantastic course Data Manipulation with pandas. We hope you enjoyed this application of the skills learned in Intermediate Python, and wish you all the best on the rest of your journey! -Bishesh Giri Posted in student blogLeave a Comment on Analyzing Netflix Movie Trends: Are Movies Getting Shorter? completion: High-Paying Jobs After 12th Science: What Are Your Options in 2023? Posted on November 7, 2023January 26, 2024 by Simoli Desai Choosing a career path after completing your 12th grade with a science background is a crucial decision. Not only do you need to consider your interests and passion, but you also want a course that offers a promising future and a high salary. If youre looking to discover a wide range of high-paying career options after your graduation, youre in the right place. In this blog, we will go through several profitable career paths available to science students after completing their 12th grade, highlighting courses that pave the way to opportunities. List of High Salary Courses after 12th Science Completing your 12th grade with a science background is a significant milestone that opens up a world of possibilities. The choices you make at this stage can profoundly impact your future career and financial prospects. Here, we present a selection of high-salary courses you might want to consider after finishing your 12th grade in the Science stream. These courses are renowned for their potential to provide lucrative career opportunities and competitive salaries, ensuring a strong foundation for a prosperous and fulfilling professional journey. MedicineMBBS Engineering Artificial Intelligence AI Data Science Information Technology IT and Software Bachelor in Hotel Management LLB Bachelor of Law BBA Bachelor of Business Administration While there may be differences in aspirations between non-engineeringmedical and engineeringmedical aspirants, the common thread is the desire for a career that promises a high salary and long-term stability. This post is designed to showcase the best career options after 12th Science, helping students from both groups choose a career path that offers a bright and secure future. Integrating Artificial Intelligence and Data Science into many of these courses is a forward-thinking choice, as AI and data-driven technologies continue to reshape various industries and create lucrative opportunities for science students in todays tech-driven world. High Salary Courses After 12th Science for Future MedicineMBBS About the Course: MBBS is an intensive and prestigious undergraduate program designed to train medical professionals. It combines extensive theoretical knowledge with practical clinical experience. Career Options after MBBS: General Physician Surgeon Pediatrician Gynecologist Anesthesiologist Radiologist Engineering About the Course: Engineering programs offer a diverse array of specializations such as civil, mechanical, electrical, and computer engineering. They focus on problem-solving, design, and innovation in various industries. Career Options after Engineering: Software Engineer Civil Engineer Mechanical Engineer Electrical Engineer Aerospace Engineer Chemical Engineer Artificial Intelligence AI About the Course: Artificial Intelligence programs delve into the creation of intelligent machines that can perform tasks typically requiring human intelligence. Topics include machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing. Career Options after Artificial Intelligence AI: Machine Learning Engineer Data Scientist AI Research Scientist AI Ethics Consultant Robotics Engineer Computer Vision Engineer Shape Your Future With a Bachelor in Artificial Intelligence AI Data Science About the Course: Data Science is the study of extracting insights and knowledge from data. It involves data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling for data-driven decision-making. Career Options after Data Science: Data Scientist Data Analyst Business Analyst Data Engineer Statistician Data Science Consultant Learn about our short course  Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Our short course Data Science and Artificial Intelligence is the perfect starting point for 2 students interested in the world of data analytics. You can gain insights and skills that can shape your academic and professional journey, helping you control the power of data. Join Us For a Promising Future in Data Science Bachelor in Information Technology BIT About the Course: IT and Software programs focus on computer science and software development, encompassing programming, web development, and software engineering. Career Options after BIT: Software Developer Web Developer Database Administrator Network Engineer Cybersecurity Analyst Systems Analyst Bachelor in Hotel Management BHM About the Course: Bachelor in Hotel Management BHM programs prepare students for careers in the hospitality and tourism industry, covering areas like hotel operations, culinary arts, and customer service. Career Options after BHM: Hotel Manager Restaurant Manager Event Planner Cruise Ship Director Travel Consultant Food and Beverage Manager LLB Bachelor of Law About the Course: LLB is a foundational law degree that provides students with a strong understanding of legal principles and practices. Its essential for those aiming for a legal career. Career Options after LLB: Lawyer Legal Consultant Corporate Counsel Judge Paralegal Legal Analyst BBA Bachelor of Business Administration About the Course: BBA is a comprehensive business program covering various aspects of business management, including finance, marketing, and human resources. Career Options after BBA: Business Analyst Marketing Manager Human Resources Manager Financial Analyst Entrepreneur Management Consultant These explanations provide a snapshot of each course, its primary focus, and potential career paths, assisting students in making informed decisions about their educational and career choices. Intersection of Science, Technology, and Healthcare In todays world, the convergence of Science, Technology, and Healthcare has never been more critical. The demand for professionals who can bridge these domains is soaring. If you have a passion for science and healthcare and are seeking a lucrative career, Data Science and AI might be the perfect choice. These fields enable you to make a significant impact by making use of data-driven insights to drive innovation in healthcare and related industries. For those with a background in science, transitioning into Data Science and AI is a natural step. Many science students opt to further enhance their skills by taking statistics or Data Science courses, unlocking a world of opportunities. Empowering Your Future in AI and Data Science At Sunway College Kathmandu, were committed to shaping the future leaders of the rapidly evolving fields of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence AI. Our mission is to empower students with internationally accredited programs, providing a solid foundation for a rewarding career. For students who have just completed their 2 education, we offer an ideal opportunity to explore their interests in data science and artificial intelligence. After 2, you can join our programs and discover if a career in these cutting-edge fields aligns with your aspirations. Our Program Offerings Our comprehensive AI program encompasses fundamental AI concepts, including machine learning and deep learning. We offer a specialized program, BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence, merging computer science with AI to create intelligent systems and tackle complex challenges. Additionally, we provide a short AI course, titled Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, which serves as an excellent starting point into the world of AI. It equips you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in these dynamic fields. Whether youre a beginner or a professional looking to upskill, this course provides an ideal platform for exploration. Join Sunway College Kathmandu and be the AI pioneer Nepal needs! completion: Considering a Bachelor Degree in AI? Heres What You Must Know. Posted on October 9, 2023December 19, 2023 by Simoli Desai Are you intrigued by the world of artificial intelligence AI and machine learning? Do you aspire to be at the forefront of technological advancements and innovation? If so, pursuing a Bachelor Degree in AI might be the perfect choice for you. In this blog, we will explore the exciting realm of AI education, including the degree courses, requirements, scope, and why Sunway College Kathmandu is an excellent choice for your AI studies. Bachelor in Artificial Intelligence AI  What You Need to Know Before you start your journey towards a Bachelors in AI, its essential to grasp the fundamentals. AI, in its essence, involves creating intelligent systems that can mimic human-like thinking and problem-solving. This field covers several subdomains, including machine learning, cloud computing, and natural language processing. A Bachelors in AI program typically delves into these areas, arming you with the essential skills needed to excel in this ever-evolving field. Artificial Intelligence, or AI, is a revolutionary field focused on making machines think and learn like humans. As technology advances, AI becomes increasingly important across many industries like healthcare, finance, transportation, and entertainment. However, its important to note that AI is not solely about technical applications. Beyond technology, AI can also facilitate advancements in scientific research, aid in creative endeavors such as art and music, contribute to environmental conservation efforts, inform business strategy, assist in legal services, and even support humanitarian initiatives. This multifaceted nature of AI demonstrates its potential to impact and enhance various aspects of our world beyond the realm of technology. Artificial Intelligence AI Courses in Nepal If youre considering a Bachelors in AI in Nepal, its essential to understand the curriculum and the courses youll encounter during your studies. These courses typically cover a wide range of subjects, such as: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence AI Website Design and Development Data Structures and Algorithms Mathematics and Statistics Object Oriented Programming Database and Web Application Development Software Design Cyber Security Data Management Cloud Computing Deep Neural Networks and Ethics Modern Data Stores and Data Protection Programming and Computer Science Machine Learning and Deep Learning Natural Language Processing These courses provide you with a solid foundation in AI, enabling you to tackle complex real-world problems using advanced technology. What is the Best Degree Needed for a Career in Artificial Intelligence AI? When considering the best degree for a career in Artificial Intelligence AI, its crucial to prioritize a genuine interest in learning and combine it with both theoretical knowledge and practical experience. While a Bachelors in AI is an excellent choice for those deeply passionate about the field, other related degrees can also lead to AI careers. Degrees in computer science, data science, or computer engineering provide a strong foundation for AI specialization through relevant coursework and projects. These programs typically cover essential topics such as machine learning, cyber security, and data analysis. However, what truly sets apart the best degree for AI is the opportunity for firsthand learning. Look for programs that typically cover essential topics such as machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis. Furthermore, a genuine interest in learning is most important. AI is a rapidly evolving field, and having a true passion for understanding and creating intelligent systems will motivate you to stay currency with the latest developments. It will drive you to search deeper into the subject matter and embrace lifelong learning as AI continues to advance. For instance, Sunway College Kathmandus AI course exemplifies this approach, offering a comprehensive education that combines theoretical knowledge with practical exposure. Graduating from such a program ensures you are not just academically prepared but also job-ready, ready to make a meaningful impact in the world of Artificial Intelligence while supporting your genuine interest in continuous learning. Shape Your Future With a Bachelor in Artificial Intelligence AI Apply Today! Worldwide, AI professionals are in high demand, and they play pivotal roles in diverse fields, from developing autonomous vehicles to creating intelligent virtual assistants. The AI revolution is transforming industries and shaping the future of technology. But what about Nepal? Nepal, like many other countries, is witnessing a growing demand for AI professionals. With its applications ranging from improving healthcare to optimizing agriculture and enhancing education, AI has the potential to make a significant impact on the nations development. By pursuing a Bachelors Degree in AI in Nepal, you position yourself at the forefront of this technological revolution. Therefore, at Sunway College Kathmandu, were dedicated to your success. As a leading institution in Nepal, we offer AI courses meticulously crafted to equip you with the skills needed to excel in this dynamic field. Our motto, Creating AI Leaders, reflects our unwavering commitment to providing and empowering the next generation of AI leaders right here in Nepal. About Bachelor in Artificial Intelligence AI at Sunway College Kathmandu Sunway College Kathmandu, guided by our powerful motto Creating AI Leaders, stands as your gateway to the thrilling realm of Artificial Intelligence AI. Our AI degree course proudly bears affiliation with Birmingham City University, UK. This affiliation not only guarantees that our programs meet international standards of excellence but also ensures they stay at the forefront of the latest industry trends in AI. We are passionately committed to bringing up future AI leaders. To achieve this goal, we offer AI courses that hold international accreditation, ensuring you receive a world-class education. Our Bachelors Degree in AI program teaches you the basics of AI, including things like machine learning, deep learning, and how computers can understand language and solve problems just like humans do. But thats not all; we have special AI programs, too: BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence AI This program combines computer science with AI. Its like learning the computer language of the future. Youll be able to create smart systems, solve tough problems, and be part of incredible AI inventions. Explore further details about the offered course by clicking here. Bachelors Degree Requirements for Artificial Intelligence AI At Sunway College Kathmandu, we welcome individuals from diverse educational backgrounds, whether you studied science, management, humanities, or something else entirely. To start your AI journey, youll need to meet specific academic prerequisites. Typically, these requirements include: Students must complete the grade 12 exam conducted by the National Exam Board NEB or equivalent with an aggregate score  3.0 CGPA For A-Levels, a minimum of 3.0 credits with at least a grade of D and above Applicants must demonstrate their English proficiency with the BCU-recognized English Tests: IELTSTOEFLPTEELLTS 6.0 overall with 5.5 minimum in all bands Meeting these requirements will set you on the path to success in your Bachelors Degree in AI. Short Artificial Intelligence Courses at Sunway College Kathmandu Alongside our Bachelors program, we also offer a range of short courses that are designed to be flexible and accessible to all. These short courses, affiliated with NCC Education, UK, provide an exceptional opportunity to explore the exciting world of AI. Data Science and Artificial Intelligence This dynamic short course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the rapidly evolving fields of data science and AI. Whether you are a newcomer looking to explore these exciting domains or a professional seeking to upskill, our course provides the perfect platform. Whether you are a beginner or looking to enhance your skills, our course offers practical knowledge and firsthand experience. Why Study Artificial Intelligence AI at Sunway College Kathmandu? Studying Artificial Intelligence AI at Sunway College Kathmandu is a smart choice for several good reasons: Modern IoT Labs: Our institution is equipped with cutting-edge Internet of Things IoT labs. Here, youll have hands-on access to the latest technologies, allowing you to experiment and innovate, bridging the gap between theory and real-world applications. LTW Approach Teaching Method: We employ the Lecture-Tutorial-Workshop LTW teaching method. This innovative approach combines theoretical knowledge with continuous assessment and practical application. Its designed to enhance your understanding and retention of AI concepts, making you job-ready upon graduation. Projects Every Semester: At Sunway College Kathmandu, learning goes beyond textbooks. We believe in a practical approach, and thats why we offer projects every semester. This firsthand experience ensures that you not only understand AI concepts but can also apply them effectively. Upto 100 Scholarship: We offer scholarships of up to 100 to deserving students, ensuring that financial constraints never hinder your pursuit of excellence in AI. Merit-Based IT Scholarship: Sunway College Kathmandu, in collaboration with DigiSchool, introduces the Merit-Based IT Scholarship for 2 Graduates. This opportunity is worth Rs. 2 crores and is specially created for students who have completed their 2 education from a DigiSchool partner institution and want to pursue a Bachelors Degree in the IT field. Internship Opportunity: At our college, we are all about preparing you for the future. Our internship placement program offers you the chance to apply your knowledge in real-world settings. You will have the chance to work with industry professionals, learn from experts, and build a network that could commence your career. At Sunway College Kathmandu, our commitment to AI education is unwavering. We offer a curriculum crafted by experts and delivered by a dedicated faculty, ensuring that you receive top-notch education and hands-on experience. We believe in preparing you not just for a degree but for a successful career in the dynamic field of artificial intelligence. By enrolling in our AI programs, youre not just entering a classroom; youre entering a world of innovation and limitless possibilities. completion: Why is the Scope of Data Science a Compelling Career Choice in Nepal? Posted on November 19, 2023December 21, 2023 by Simoli Desai In todays world, we are witnessing an unprecedented surge in data generation. This data serves as the lifeblood for businesses, fueling their growth and development. However, this data is often unstructured and stored in the cloud, necessitating the expertise of data scientists to process and harness it into a valuable asset. The extensive influence of data-driven technology is reshaping not only our daily lives but also businesses, a transformation that has accelerated over the past decade. Data science, with its primary objective of searching deep into data to display hidden potentials and deliver tangible value, has become an integral component of businesses across all sectors. The unyielding demand for data analysis has established a unique niche for data scientists in the business landscape. In this blog, you will learn the importance and scope of data science. Likewise, we will discuss the data scientists future scope to help you reach higher-paying positions in the industry. Moreover, this blog will uncover the scope of data science in Nepal and answer why data science is a good career option. What is Data Science? Data Science is more than one academic field that combines techniques from statistics, computer science, and domain knowledge to extract valuable insights and knowledge from data. It involves collecting, processing, and analyzing data to uncover patterns, trends, and information that can be used to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive business strategies. Data scientists use various tools and techniques, including data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization, to transform raw data into actionable knowledge. Is Data Science a Good Career Option? Data science is undeniably one of the most promising career choices in the world today. Several compelling reasons make this profession highly attractive: High Demand: Businesses and organizations rely on data-driven decision-making, creating a strong demand for data scientists who can extract valuable insights from the vast amounts of data generated daily. Diverse Applications: Data science finds relevance in various industries, such as finance, healthcare, e-commerce, agriculture, and more. This versatility allows data scientists to work in fields aligned with their passions. Attractive Salaries: Data scientists often command competitive salaries due to their specialized skills and the high demand for their expertise. Constant Learning: The dynamic and evolving nature of data science ensures professionals remain engaged and up-to-date with the latest technologies and methodologies. Global Opportunities: Data science professionals enjoy the flexibility to work remotely, collaborate with international clients, and explore job opportunities worldwide. As data science technology rapidly advances, and datas value continues to soar, data science remains among the most sought-after professions. Data scientists play a pivotal role in comprehending, interpreting, and leveraging data for informed decision-making across various sectors, including businesses, government departments, and organizations. The significance of a data scientists role is set to further escalate as data assumes greater importance for businesses. As data grows larger, more complex, and increasingly accessible through powerful big data analytics tools, the demand for data scientists will only intensify. This points toward an expanding data science scope in the future, solidifying its status as an exceptionally lucrative career option. Join Sunway College Kathmandu and be the AI pioneer Nepal needs! Apply Now! For those aspiring to establish a data science career, a firm grasp of data science tools and technologies is essential. The ability to interpret data, develop data models, and construct data analytics solutions is essential. Additionally, strong problem-solving skills, effective communication, and a drive to unearth insights from data are highly valuable. Therefore, data science is an excellent career choice for individuals looking to make a tangible impact through data-driven decision-making. Given the ever-expanding data science future scope, it is a worthwhile career path for those interested in the data field. Moreover, data science roles typically offer competitive remuneration and exciting opportunities, making it a highly rewarding choice for those who pursue this path. Future Scope of Data Science The future of Data Science is dynamic, evolving with the new technologies and tools. In the coming decade, its set to grow, with enough job opportunities for data scientists. This strong outlook is driven by the ever-expanding data landscape and industry demand. Likewise, below are some stats that enlighten us about the acclaimed future of data science: The US Bureau of Labor Statistics projects a 36 growth in data scientist employment from 2021 to 2031. The global data science platform market is expected to experience a CAGR of 33.6, with its value soaring from USD 4.7 billion in 2020 to USD 79.7 billion by 2030. Due to increasing demand, the average salaries for data science and machine learning roles are on the rise, with data scientists earning an average of USD 176,213 and data engineers averaging USD 166,992. Therefore, the future of data science looks exceptionally bright, offering a wealth of opportunities and a promising career landscape for aspiring professionals. Scope of Data Science in Nepal In recent years, the scope of data science has witnessed a significant upsurge in Nepal, making it an attractive career choice for the countrys youth. In this blog, we will delve into the reasons why the field of data science is a compelling career choice in Nepal. Increasing Demand for Data Professionals One of the primary factors driving the demand for data science professionals in Nepal is the increasing reliance on data-driven decision-making across various industries. From healthcare and finance to e-commerce and agriculture, organizations are realizing the immense value of data in gaining a competitive edge. This shift has created a significant demand for data scientists who can extract insights and help organizations make informed decisions. Versatility of Data Science Data science is a versatile field that can be applied to a wide range of industries and domains. In Nepal, this versatility is particularly advantageous as it allows data scientists to work in various sectors, from agriculture and tourism to disaster management and public health. The ability to adapt and apply data science methodologies to different sectors makes it an appealing career choice for those seeking diverse and exciting opportunities. Impact on Social and Environmental Issues Nepal faces unique social and environmental challenges, and data science can play a pivotal role in addressing these issues. Data-driven solutions can be used to improve public health, disaster preparedness, agriculture, and environmental conservation in Nepal. This potential for positive social impact makes data science a meaningful career choice for individuals who want to contribute to the betterment of their country. Educational Opportunities The education sector in Nepal has been quick to recognize the growing importance of data science. Several universities and institutions in Nepal now offer data science programs, which provide aspiring professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in this field. These educational opportunities make it easier for Nepali students to pursue a career in data science without having to travel abroad. Global Accessibility and Remote Work One of the advantages of a career in data science is the ability to work remotely and connect with global clients and employers. This not only offers flexibility but also opens up the possibility of working for international companies while staying in Nepal. As the world increasingly shifts towards remote work, data science professionals can tap into global job markets without leaving their homeland. Competitive Salaries The demand for data scientists in Nepal has led to competitive salaries, making it a lucrative career choice. Data science professionals in Nepal can earn a respectable income, often on par with or even exceeding the salaries in traditional professions. This financial stability is a significant draw for many young professionals. As the country continues to cherish the digital age, the future for data science professionals in Nepal looks bright, and those who take up this career path are likely to find exciting opportunities and a chance to make a meaningful impact on their society and beyond. Shaping the Future with Data Science Starting a data science career in todays digital era is an exciting and fulfilling opportunity. Whether you are starting from scratch or seeking to enhance your skills, now is the ideal moment to take that crucial first step into this dynamic field. By mastering the complexity of data science, you open the door to a world of possibilities and the chance to contribute to groundbreaking innovations across diverse industries. If you are eager to grab the promising prospects that data science presents, Sunway College Kathmandu is your ultimate destination. Our institution offers comprehensive Data Science courses with Artificial Intelligence that not only impart essential knowledge but also equip you with the necessary skills and tools to excel in this ever-evolving field. prompt: Summarize this general content: Highest Salary Paying AI Jobs in Nepal.  Sunway College
completion: Highest Salary Paying AI Jobs in Nepal. Posted on November 12, 2023January 26, 2024 by Simoli Desai The AI revolution is sweeping the world, and Nepal is no exception. As artificial intelligence continues to reshape industries and create new opportunities, the demand for skilled AI professionals in Nepal is skyrocketing. These professionals are at the forefront of innovation and enjoy some of the most attractive salaries in the job market. In this blog, well explore some of the highest-paying AI jobs in Nepal, shedding light on the lucrative opportunities that await talented individuals in this dynamic field. Artificial Intelligence AI in Nepal AIs impact on Nepals job market cannot be underestimated. It is both transforming existing roles and ushering in entirely new career opportunities. To succeed in this field, individuals must acquire advanced skills and knowledge, making it clear that AI is not merely trivial programming. A solid educational background and training are prerequisites, alongside proficiency in computer science and programming. Is AI a High-Paying Job? Without a doubt, AI is synonymous with high-paying jobs. AI professionals are highly sought after in todays job market, and their salaries reflect the value they bring to the industry. The demand for AI experts has driven up compensation, making AI one of the most financially rewarding career paths in Nepal. Following are the top high-salary AI jobs in Nepal, attracting talent from all over the country and promising a prosperous future for venturing into the world of artificial intelligence. Top High-Paying AI Jobs in Nepal Machine Learning Engineer Salary in Nepal: Machine Learning Engineers in Nepal can expect to earn between NPR 100,000 to NPR 400,000 per month. For seasoned professionals with substantial experience, the salary can go beyond NPR 600,000. Machine Learning Engineers play a pivotal role in AI development by creating and implementing machine learning algorithms and models. This task involves training, which is a high processor and computation-intensive aspect of machine learning. Given the complexity of this work, it demands the highest level of skill and training. Most Machine Learning Engineers hold advanced degrees in computer science, mathematics, or statistics. They often pursue further training through certification programs or masters degrees in areas such as machine learning, deep learning, or neural networks. Data Scientist Salary in Nepal: Data Scientists in Nepal can earn between NPR 150,000 to NPR 300,000 per month, with experienced professionals commanding higher salaries. Data Scientists are technology professionals who specialize in collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to solve problems and drive decision-making within organizations. While not all are programmers, many write their applications. They frequently employ data mining, big data tools, and analytical techniques. Their insights derived from data help businesses improve sales, and operations, make informed decisions, and develop new products and services. Predictive modeling and data visualization are part of their toolkit, with some using machine learning to automate these tasks. Data Engineer Salary in Nepal: Data Engineers or Architects in Nepal typically earn between NPR 180,000 and NPR 350,000 per month. Data Engineers work with massive data sets, a fundamental aspect of AI. They are responsible for designing, building, testing, and maintaining complex data processing systems. These professionals typically work with big data tools like Hadoop, Hive, Spark, and Kafka. Advanced degrees in mathematics and statistics are often prerequisites for these roles, as they are crucial for designing, maintaining, and building data pipelines based on extensive data sets. Software Engineer Salary in Nepal: Software Engineers with AI skills in Nepal can expect monthly earnings ranging from NPR 120,000 to NPR 250,000, depending on experience and expertise. Software Engineers in the AI domain are responsible for various activities in the software development chain, including design, development, testing, and deployment. AI Software Engineers design, develop, test, and deploy applications related to machine learning, inference, natural language processing NLP, sensory input, cybersecurity, and intrusion detection. AI Research Scientist Salary in Nepal: AI Research Scientists in Nepal can command monthly salaries ranging from NPR 250,000 to NPR 500,000 or more. AI Research Scientists are computer scientists who specialize in studying and developing new AI algorithms and techniques. Their work involves developing and testing new AI models, collaborating with other researchers, publishing research papers, and presenting findings at conferences. While programming is a component of their work, a significant portion of their role involves research and innovation. AI Research Scientists typically hold graduate degrees and have a strong background in computer science, mathematics, and statistics. What factors impact the average salary of an AI professional? The average salary of an AI professional is subject to various factors that significantly impact earnings. Education, experience, geographic location, industry, and the specific job role all contribute to determining ones income in this field. Notably, experience stands out as one of the most influential elements affecting salary levels. The logic is simple: the more experience you accumulate as an AI engineer, the deeper your expertise becomes, and consequently, the higher your earning potential in this dynamic and evolving industry. AI for a Good Future Career AI isnt merely a good career; its a future-proof one. As AI continues to shape the world, the demand for AI professionals will only continue to grow. A career in AI offers high earning potential, job security, and the opportunity to contribute to the future of technology. Sunway College Kathmandu recognizes the importance of bringing up talent in this field, offering programs such as Data Science and Artificial Intelligence and BSc Hons Computer Science with AI that ensure students are well-prepared for the exciting journey that lies ahead. Join Sunway College Kathmandu and be the AI pioneer Nepal needs! Apply Now!
