prompt: Summarize this general content: Frequently Asked Questions - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Faq Frequently asked questions Where can I study AI in Nepal? You can study AI at various local universities, local university colleges and foreign affiliated colleges in Nepal. The course offered at Sunway College Kathmandu is BScHons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence which specializes in data science and artificial intelligence. What is the global ranking of Birmingham City University? Birmingham City University ranks 501  600 globally as per Times Higher Education 2024. Why should I study with a high ranking university? A degree from a top university is recognized worldwide, opening doors to international opportunities. Are the courses approved by the Ministry of Education Nepal? Yes, the courses offered by Sunway College Kathmandu are approved by the Ministry of Education, Nepal. Are the courses certified equivalence by Tribhuwan University? Yes, the courses offered by Sunway College Kathmandu are certified equivalence by Tribhuwan University. Which 2 stream students can apply for the BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence program? All 2 stream students Science, Management, Humanities, Education and others can apply for the program having met the eligibility criteria mentioned under the program. I do not have GPA 3.0 and above, can I still apply to study at Sunway College Kathmandu? Students who do not meet the entry requirements, can still apply to study the course. The application submitted shall be verified by the Course Committee at BCU and can be approved on a case by case basis. Do BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence programs include placement? Yes, the program includes a dedicated professional placement year. Where can we get placed in the professional placement year? We have a dedicated placement cell headed by Khushal Regmi, Professional Placement Coordinator who is responsible for collaborating with the industry to bring professional placement opportunities to the students. Students may also seek placement opportunities on their own and shall receive support from the placement cell during the process. The placement cell also organizes various skill training sessions that helps students to meet the entry level standards for the industry. Are there any scholarships available at Sunway College? Yes, scholarships are available based on merit and economic condition. How do I apply to Sunway College? You can fill out the admission form here: or contact the Admissions Department at admissionsunway.edu.np or 9823047066. How many enrollment intakes does Sunway have in a year? There are two enrollment intakes, Autumn and Spring intakes. Where is Sunway College Kathmandu Located? Sunway College Kathmandu is located Behind Maitidevi Temple, Maitidevi, Kathmandu, Nepal. What are the available courses at Sunway College? The available courses at Sunway are: BSc Hons Computer Science With Artificial Intelligence AI in academic partnership with Birmingham City University, UK. Approved BScHons Business Information Technology Approval in process - expected to run by Autumn 2025 BScHons Cybersecurity Approval in process - expected to run by Autumn 2025 MSc Artificial Intelligence Approval in process - expected to run by Autumn 2025 What is the Sunway AI Scholarship Award? The Sunway AI Scholarship Award is offered by Sunway College Kathmandu to support outstanding students pursuing a BScHons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence based on a scholarship test. What are the eligibility criteria for the AI Scholarship Award? The Sunway AI Scholarship Award is determined post admissions. The student must have achieved the following: Completed Grade 12 with a minimum CGPA of 3.0 or equivalent Met English proficiency requirements Grade B in Grade 12 English  BCU EPT 5.5 or equivalent recognized English test Attended Early Bird Admissions Classes Settled all admission fees at Sunway College Kathmandu What is the application deadline for the Sunway AI Scholarship Award for Spring 2025 Intake? The application deadline for the Sunway AI Scholarship Award for Sprint 2025 Intae is March 14, 2025. How will the scholarship recipients be selected? 100 Scholarship: Based on Scholarship Test and Interview March 30th  31st, 2025 50 Scholarships: Based on Scholarship Test and Interview March 30th  31st, 2025 30 Scholarships: Based on admission documents and interview What does the scholarship cover? 100 Scholarship: Covers college semester fees excluding admission fees, inductionECACCA fees, annual fees, and university fees 50 Scholarships: Covers 50 of college semester fees excluding admission fees, inductionECACCA fees, annual fees, and university fees 30 Scholarships: Covers 30 of college semester fees excluding admission fees, inductionECACCA fees, annual fees, and university fees How can I renew my scholarship? Maintaining satisfactory academic performance as per the scholarship policy and college regulations is crucial for scholarship renewal. What happens if I fail to maintain the scholarship requirements? Failure to meet the academic performance standards may result in the revocation of the scholarship award. What are the key features of the BSc Hons Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence program? Strong foundation in Computer Science Focus on key AI topics like Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing Industry-relevant skills development Professional placement year for practical experience Individual Honours Project for in-depth research and application What are the entry requirements for the program? Grade 12 completion with a minimum CGPA of 3.0 or equivalent Meeting English proficiency requirements Grade B in Grade 12 English  BCU EPT 5.5 or equivalent recognized English test What are the career prospects after completing this program? After completing the course, you may choose to work as a Software Developer, Software Engineer, Web Developer, Computer Programmer, Machine Learning Engineer, Data Scientist, Artificial Intelligence Engineer and many more! Are there any job opportunities for students? Yes, the course offers a 9-month placement to students as part of the Professional Placement Year. The college also has a dedicated placement cell. Who to consult for job placements in Sunway College? You can talk to Mr. Khushal Regmi, who heads the placement cell at Sunway College in the capacity of the Professional Placement Coordinator. What is professional placement? After the completion of the second year, students must undergo a placement year where they are hired by companies as interns for at least 9 months. How much are the opportunities for on-campus jobs? Students are often hired as interns based on their performance by the college during their academic journey at the college. You can work with the IT department, IoT and Research Lab at the college. What are the class timings at Sunway? The class schedule is released by the Registry Timetable and Examination Department at the beginning of each semester and updated as required. The classes usually run from 7 AM to 1 PM. Additional classes may be offered on a case by case basis. Does Sunway College Kathmandu have an official student body? Yes. The official student body at Sunway College Kathmandu is Sunway Student Representative Council. The council has student representatives from all batches and the executive members of the council run various clubs at Sunway. How do I apply for data fellowship at Sunway? Sunway Student Representative Council partners with DataCamp to offer Data Fellowship to students from all over Nepal. You can visit their website and subscribe to their social media accounts to stay updated regarding the data fellowship openings or simply inquire at datafellowshipsunway.edu.np. Do students have Research Opportunities at Sunway College? Students are required to mandatorily learn research writing right from the inception of their course and have the opportunity to work in the research lab alongside dedicated research assistants and professors at the college. The college also provides ample opportunities for students to collaborate with industry experts or researchers to work on various projects. Start with Sunway College Quick Enquiry

prompt: Summarize this general content: About Us - Sunway College Kathmandu
completion: Who We Are Weve been looking for You ! Before we answer the why question, take this words tour to know who we are. We are those who understand the importance of aligning your passion to your profession. It will help you to identify with your areas of strength, weakness, opportunity and threat, a SWOT and also guide you towards the right job at the end through placement day. Now, putting our professional suit on, Since its establishment in the year 2010, a 13 year history, Sunway college has been providing academic excellence to produce highly skilled human resources of IT and business-oriented degrees. We are dedicated to mint both academic and professional standards of our students, the Sunwayians. With above 90 placement of alumni ,they are actively working in government sectors, private institutes, entrepreneurship and in international market. With that being said, we are introducing Digital marketing and Data Science with a bigger vision to cater the global demand that enables to built the top 10 skilled-manpower of the future. Working with multiple international universities has given us a peak on their education system and that has inspired us to make our own system better. Today, we are academically partnered with Birmingham City University BCU, UK. A curious mind with 21st century skills and a zest of a learner is someone who we have been looking for. If you know you are the one, Start With Sunway. Insights Leadership Message The education sector could not be left unaffected by the current wave of modernization and digitization. In keeping with this philosophy, we have introduced one of the leading edge and entrepreneurship-focused Birmingham City University to Nepal, to serve students seeking an affordable international education. Im confident that the academic collaboration with Birmingham City University will benefit local students, employers, and the community as a whole. Our current focus is on awarding undergraduate degrees to students, but we intend to expand to other programs as needed in the future to meet demand. The academic partnership with Birmingham City University will soon offer more doors for opportunities to support additional programs. Shortening the gap and inheriting skills to be future-ready requires growth in both mindset and knowledge. Through a holistic approach, we provide support to the students for their overall development and uphold the environment that tends to their physical, emotional, and social wellbeing. Sunway College also offers industrial training to get students ready for the industry and to create a skilled workforce. I urge all future graduate and undergraduate students, along with their parents, to think about Sunway College as a high-quality, well-known, and affordable education institution. Bigyan Shrestha Chairman In the past few decades, we have seen significant advancements in the usage of social media platforms which have fundamentally altered customer behavior and patterns. This has all been possible due to the current wave of digitalization and can be marked as the beginning of the digital era. The most striking outcome of the digital revolution is the amount of data that is now collected and analyzed leading to an information explosion and the creation of more and more data-driven platforms. For a country like Nepal, Digital Marketing and Data Science can be a fantastic field to start a career where interest in business is growing and information technology is on the rise. So, to provide a head start to the students, Sunway College in academic partnership with Birmingham City University is providing programs to develop highly competitive human capital, be abreast with modern technologies and be socially responsible towards the community. The limitless scope and vast reach of these programs enable students to guarantee their futures globally. Since its Establishment in 2010, Sunway College has been successful in providing the community with a quality, qualified, and responsible workforce that is resolving issues in the real world and making significant economic contributions in the process This academic collaboration is a perfect match between an institution based in Nepal with a global vision and an institution based in the UK with an international outlook and exposure. Mr. Pramod Poudel Academic Director Unique Value Why We Stand Out Why Sunway College? Sunway College Kathmandu, a leading AI college in Nepal, offers a specialized Bachelor Degree in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. As one of the top AI colleges in Nepal, we are dedicated to mint academic and professional standards in our students who will become a believer in change, responsible and innovative after the completion of the course. In Academic Partnership with BCU Sunway College is affiliated with Birmingham City University BCU which is recognized as one of the most promising academic institutions in the United Kingdom. The academic collaboration with BCU offers graduate students numerous opportunities and exposure in the international market. Teaching Approach We adopt an internationally recognized L-T-W Lecture, Tutorial, and Workshop teaching approach which focuses on the practicality and applicability of learning. Through a holistic approach, our academic program is designed to assist students in integrating their knowledge into real-world circumstances. Affordability Sunway College provides students with a range of scholarship programs in addition to reasonable tuition rates to support students financially. Sunway College also awards scholarships based on students athletic abilities and talents.
